old man with his pistol, eventually stealing a black mitsubishi mirage. the car was later found abandoned around fairmont terrace in the glenn terrace or ridge street area.', 'hypothesis': 'children in new zealand are forced to wear orange overalls.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['in a separate mass shooting on saturday in pittsburgh, a man donned a bulletproof vest and killed three police officers after he had been driven into a murderous rage by an argument with his mother over a dog.  according to court papers, richard poplawski — who had recently been dishonourably discharged from the us marines — had been arguing with his mother about the dog urinating inside their home early on saturday morning when she threatened to evict him. when the argument escalated, she called the police. by the time a patrol car turned up at after 7am, mr poplawski, 23, had armed himself with an assault rifle, a long-arm rifle, a pistol and several rounds of ammunition.\n The question is: in pittsburgh a man shot 3 policemen.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'fmln militias sabotaged power lines along the road linking nueva concepcion to the northern trunk highway at 1800 on 12 august.\n The question is: power lines were attacked by fmln.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'two greenpeace protestors entered the cbi conference at the business design centre in islington, london and delayed a speech being made by the prime minister tony blair, in which he was expected to announce the consideration of further nuclear power stations to offset the increasing gas prices being experienced by industry in the uk. the protestors, wearing yellow safety jackets over business suits, climbed up into the ceiling rafters and held  banners saying "nuclear: wrong answer", and dropped \'radioactive confetti\' onto the delegates down below. greenpeace threatened to make noise and throw missiles at the prime minister should he make his speech.\n The question is: greenpeace made a statement about yellow safety jackets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'police say that he was wearing orange overalls, a balaclava and a pistol when he stole $6300 from cherrywood at about 3:15 p.m. outside the bank leatham was trying to hijack a car, he threatened an old man with his pistol, eventually stealing a black mitsubishi mirage. the car was later found abandoned around fairmont terrace in the glenn terrace or ridge street area.\n The question is: children in new zealand are forced to wear orange overalls.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['in a separate mass shooting on saturday in pittsburgh, a man donned a bulletproof vest and killed three police officers after he had been driven into a murderous rage by an argument with his mother over a dog.  according to court papers, richard poplawski — who had recently been dishonourably discharged from the us marines — had been arguing with his mother about the dog urinating inside their home early on saturday morning when she threatened to evict him. when the argument escalated, she called the police. by the time a patrol car turned up at after 7am, mr poplawski, 23, had armed himself with an assault rifle, a long-arm rifle, a pistol and several rounds of ammunition.\n The question is: in pittsburgh a man shot 3 policemen.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'fmln militias sabotaged power lines along the road linking nueva concepcion to the northern trunk highway at 1800 on 12 august.\n The question is: power lines were attacked by fmln.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'two greenpeace protestors entered the cbi conference at the business design centre in islington, london and delayed a speech being made by the prime minister tony blair, in which he was expected to announce the consideration of further nuclear power stations to offset the increasing gas prices being experienced by industry in the uk. the protestors, wearing yellow safety jackets over business suits, climbed up into the ceiling rafters and held  banners saying "nuclear: wrong answer", and dropped \'radioactive confetti\' onto the delegates down below. greenpeace threatened to make noise and throw missiles at the prime minister should he make his speech.\n The question is: greenpeace made a statement about yellow safety jackets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'police say that he was wearing orange overalls, a balaclava and a pistol when he stole $6300 from cherrywood at about 3:15 p.m. outside the bank leatham was trying to hijack a car, he threatened an old man with his pistol, eventually stealing a black mitsubishi mirage. the car was later found abandoned around fairmont terrace in the glenn terrace or ridge street area.\n The question is: children in new zealand are forced to wear orange overalls.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
Examples ['in a separate mass shooting on saturday in pittsburgh, a man donned a bulletproof vest and killed three police officers after he had been driven into a murderous rage by an argument with his mother over a dog.  according to court papers, richard poplawski — who had recently been dishonourably discharged from the us marines — had been arguing with his mother about the dog urinating inside their home early on saturday morning when she threatened to evict him. when the argument escalated, she called the police. by the time a patrol car turned up at after 7am, mr poplawski, 23, had armed himself with an assault rifle, a long-arm rifle, a pistol and several rounds of ammunition.\n The question is: in pittsburgh a man shot 3 policemen.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'fmln militias sabotaged power lines along the road linking nueva concepcion to the northern trunk highway at 1800 on 12 august.\n The question is: power lines were attacked by fmln.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'two greenpeace protestors entered the cbi conference at the business design centre in islington, london and delayed a speech being made by the prime minister tony blair, in which he was expected to announce the consideration of further nuclear power stations to offset the increasing gas prices being experienced by industry in the uk. the protestors, wearing yellow safety jackets over business suits, climbed up into the ceiling rafters and held  banners saying "nuclear: wrong answer", and dropped \'radioactive confetti\' onto the delegates down below. greenpeace threatened to make noise and throw missiles at the prime minister should he make his speech.\n The question is: greenpeace made a statement about yellow safety jackets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police say that he was wearing orange overalls, a balaclava and a pistol when he stole $6300 from cherrywood at about 3:15 p.m. outside the bank leatham was trying to hijack a car, he threatened an old man with his pistol, eventually stealing a black mitsubishi mirage. the car was later found abandoned around fairmont terrace in the glenn terrace or ridge street area.\n The question is: children in new zealand are forced to wear orange overalls.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['in a separate mass shooting on saturday in pittsburgh, a man donned a bulletproof vest and killed three police officers after he had been driven into a murderous rage by an argument with his mother over a dog.  according to court papers, richard poplawski — who had recently been dishonourably discharged from the us marines — had been arguing with his mother about the dog urinating inside their home early on saturday morning when she threatened to evict him. when the argument escalated, she called the police. by the time a patrol car turned up at after 7am, mr poplawski, 23, had armed himself with an assault rifle, a long-arm rifle, a pistol and several rounds of ammunition.\n The question is: in pittsburgh a man shot 3 policemen.. ICL Examples [[{'premise': "at least eight people have been killed in a suicide bomb attack on sri lanka's army headquarters, while the head of the army has been seriously injured. lt gen sarath fonseka is said to be in a stable condition after surgery in colombo, where the attack happened. the military has blamed tamil tiger rebels for the attack and launched air strikes on their positions in the east.", 'hypothesis': 'people were killed in suicide attacks.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'nine soldiers and two police officers were killed in the ensuing gun battle, and two police officers were wounded, the officials said.', 'hypothesis': 'six policemen and two soldiers were killed in a gunbattle, officials said.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'after his release, the clean-shaven magdy el-nashar told reporters outside his home that he had nothing to do with the july 7 transit attacks, which killed 52 people and the four bombers.', 'hypothesis': '52 people and four bombers were killed on july 7.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a report prepared by a five member un commission noted "killing of civilians, enforced disappearances, destruction of villages, rape and other forms of sexual violence, pillaging and forced displacement, throughout darfur", and secretly named alleged war criminals that should go before the icc.', 'hypothesis': 'more than 200,000 people were killed in the air attack in the darfur region.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ["at least eight people have been killed in a suicide bomb attack on sri lanka's army headquarters, while the head of the army has been seriously injured. lt gen sarath fonseka is said to be in a stable condition after surgery in colombo, where the attack happened. the military has blamed tamil tiger rebels for the attack and launched air strikes on their positions in the east.\n The question is: people were killed in suicide attacks.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'nine soldiers and two police officers were killed in the ensuing gun battle, and two police officers were wounded, the officials said.\n The question is: six policemen and two soldiers were killed in a gunbattle, officials said.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'after his release, the clean-shaven magdy el-nashar told reporters outside his home that he had nothing to do with the july 7 transit attacks, which killed 52 people and the four bombers.\n The question is: 52 people and four bombers were killed on july 7.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a report prepared by a five member un commission noted "killing of civilians, enforced disappearances, destruction of villages, rape and other forms of sexual violence, pillaging and forced displacement, throughout darfur", and secretly named alleged war criminals that should go before the icc.\n The question is: more than 200,000 people were killed in the air attack in the darfur region.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ["at least eight people have been killed in a suicide bomb attack on sri lanka's army headquarters, while the head of the army has been seriously injured. lt gen sarath fonseka is said to be in a stable condition after surgery in colombo, where the attack happened. the military has blamed tamil tiger rebels for the attack and launched air strikes on their positions in the east.\n The question is: people were killed in suicide attacks.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'nine soldiers and two police officers were killed in the ensuing gun battle, and two police officers were wounded, the officials said.\n The question is: six policemen and two soldiers were killed in a gunbattle, officials said.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['canada and the united states signed an agreement on january 30, 1979, to amend the treaty to allow subsistence hunting of waterfowl.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'following the israel-egypt peace treaty of 1979, israel agreed to withdraw from the sinai peninsula, in exchange for peace with its neighbor. for over two decades, the sinai peninsula was home to about 7,000 israelis.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

ICL Examples [[{'premise': "morton's book was published january 15, and hit number one on amazon.com's top sellers list on january 18. yesterday, the book hit the number one spot on the new york times best sellers list. the book is not for sale in britain or ireland, and the new york post has reported that british tourists to the united states are buying copies of the book to bring back home. morton makes some controversial assertions in the book, including that cruise is second in command at the church of scientology, and that scientology was the cause of cruise and nicole kidman's separation.", 'hypothesis': 'tom cruise is married to katie holmes.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'tom cruise has returned to the oprah winfrey show and talked about his love for katie holmes, but this time he was denying marital problems instead of jumping on the couch to prove his passion for the young actress. "that\'s laughable to me," cruise said when winfrey told him there was speculation that "what you and katie have is not real". it was the first time cruise appeared on the show since his couch-hopping stunt three years ago drew a flood of satire and ridicule. "it was something that i just felt that way, and i feel that way about her. that\'s just how i felt," he said in the interview, which aired on friday in the us.', 'hypothesis': 'tom cruise is married to oprah winfrey.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'tom cruise is married to actress nicole kidman and the couple has 2 adopted children.', 'hypothesis': 'tom cruise is married to nicole kidman.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "et confirms that actor bruce willis has married his girlfriend of a year, model/actress emma heming.  a small, private wedding ceremony took place on saturday at willis' home in parrot cay, turks & caicos, a rep said.  in attendance were the 54-year-old actor's first wife, demi moore, and her husband ashton kutcher, as well as his daughters rumer, scout, and tallulah belle. the couple plans to hold a civil ceremony when they return to california.", 'hypothesis': "bruce willis' wife is from california.", 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ["morton's book was published january 15, and hit number one on amazon.com's top sellers list on january 18. yesterday, the book hit the number one spot on the new york times best sellers list. the book is not for sale in britain or ireland, and the new york post has reported that british tourists to the united states are buying copies of the book to bring back home. morton makes some controversial assertions in the book, including that cruise is second in command at the church of scientology, and that scientology was the cause of cruise and nicole kidman's separation.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to katie holmes.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'tom cruise has returned to the oprah winfrey show and talked about his love for katie holmes, but this time he was denying marital problems instead of jumping on the couch to prove his passion for the young actress. "that\'s laughable to me," cruise said when winfrey told him there was speculation that "what you and katie have is not real". it was the first time cruise appeared on the show since his couch-hopping stunt three years ago drew a flood of satire and ridicule. "it was something that i just felt that way, and i feel that way about her. that\'s just how i felt," he said in the interview, which aired on friday in the us.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to oprah winfrey.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'tom cruise is married to actress nicole kidman and the couple has 2 adopted children.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to nicole kidman.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "et confirms that actor bruce willis has married his girlfriend of a year, model/actress emma heming.  a small, private wedding ceremony took place on saturday at willis' home in parrot cay, turks & caicos, a rep said.  in attendance were the 54-year-old actor's first wife, demi moore, and her husband ashton kutcher, as well as his daughters rumer, scout, and tallulah belle. the couple plans to hold a civil ceremony when they return to california.\n The question is: bruce willis' wife is from california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

Examples ["morton's book was published january 15, and hit number one on amazon.com's top sellers list on january 18. yesterday, the book hit the number one spot on the new york times best sellers list. the book is not for sale in britain or ireland, and the new york post has reported that british tourists to the united states are buying copies of the book to bring back home. morton makes some controversial assertions in the book, including that cruise is second in command at the church of scientology, and that scientology was the cause of cruise and nicole kidman's separation.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to katie holmes.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'tom cruise has returned to the oprah winfrey show and talked about his love for katie holmes, but this time he was denying marital problems instead of jumping on the couch to prove his passion for the young actress. "that\'s laughable to me," cruise said when winfrey told him there was speculation that "what you and katie have is not real". it was the first time cruise appeared on the show since his couch-hopping stunt three years ago drew a flood of satire and ridicule. "it was something that i just felt that way, and i feel that way about her. that\'s just how i felt," he said in the interview, which aired on friday in the us.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to oprah winfrey.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'tom cruise is married to actress nicole kidman and the couple has 2 adopted children.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to nicole kidman.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "et confirms that actor bruce willis has married his girlfriend of a year, model/actress emma heming.  a small, private wedding ceremony took place on saturday at willis' home in parrot cay, turks & caicos, a rep said.  in attendance were the 54-year-old actor's first wife, demi moore, and her husband ashton kutcher, as well as his daughters rumer, scout, and tallulah belle. the couple plans to hold a civil ceremony when they return to california.\n The question is: bruce willis' wife is from california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
Examples ["morton's book was published january 15, and hit number one on amazon.com's top sellers list on january 18. yesterday, the book hit the number one spot on the new york times best sellers list. the book is not for sale in britain or ireland, and the new york post has reported that british tourists to the united states are buying copies of the book to bring back home. morton makes some controversial assertions in the book, including that cruise is second in command at the church of scientology, and that scientology was the cause of cruise and nicole kidman's separation.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to katie holmes.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'tom cruise has returned to the oprah winfrey show and talked about his love for katie holmes, but this time he was denying marital problems instead of jumping on the couch to prove his passion for the young actress. "that\'s laughable to me," cruise said when winfrey told him there was speculation that "what you and katie have is not real". it was the first time cruise appeared on the show since his couch-hopping stunt three years ago drew a flood of satire and ridicule. "it was something that i just felt that way, and i feel that way about her. that\'s just how i felt," he said in the interview, which aired on friday in the us.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to oprah winfrey.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'tom cruise is married to actress nicole kidman and the couple has 2 adopted children.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to nicole kidman.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "et confirms that actor bruce willis has married his girlfriend of a year, model/actress emma heming.  a small, private wedding ceremony took place on saturday at willis' home in parrot cay, turks & caicos, a rep said.  in attendance were the 54-year-old actor's first wife, demi moore, and her husband ashton kutcher, as well as his daughters rumer, scout, and tallulah belle. the couple plans to hold a civil ceremony when they return to california.\n The question is: bruce willis' wife is from california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

Examples ["morton's book was published january 15, and hit number one on amazon.com's top sellers list on january 18. yesterday, the book hit the number one spot on the new york times best sellers list. the book is not for sale in britain or ireland, and the new york post has reported that british tourists to the united states are buying copies of the book to bring back home. morton makes some controversial assertions in the book, including that cruise is second in command at the church of scientology, and that scientology was the cause of cruise and nicole kidman's separation.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to katie holmes.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'tom cruise has returned to the oprah winfrey show and talked about his love for katie holmes, but this time he was denying marital problems instead of jumping on the couch to prove his passion for the young actress. "that\'s laughable to me," cruise said when winfrey told him there was speculation that "what you and katie have is not real". it was the first time cruise appeared on the show since his couch-hopping stunt three years ago drew a flood of satire and ridicule. "it was something that i just felt that way, and i feel that way about her. that\'s just how i felt," he said in the interview, which aired on friday in the us.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to oprah winfrey.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'tom cruise is married to actress nicole kidman and the couple has 2 adopted children.\n The question is: tom cruise is married to nicole kidman.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "et confirms that actor bruce willis has married his girlfriend of a year, model/actress emma heming.  a small, private wedding ceremony took place on saturday at willis' home in parrot cay, turks & caicos, a rep said.  in attendance were the 54-year-old actor's first wife, demi moore, and her husband ashton kutcher, as well as his daughters rumer, scout, and tallulah belle. the couple plans to hold a civil ceremony when they return to california.\n The question is: bruce willis' wife is from california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]
ICL Examples [[{'premise': "located just three miles from tullamore and only 45 minutes from the k club, venue of the 2006 ryder cup, is esker hills, a genuine hidden gem and one of irish golf's best kept secrets.", 'hypothesis': 'the k club will host the 2006 ryder cup.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the duke of edinburgh and i are very happy that the prince of wales and mrs. parker bowles are to marry.', 'hypothesis': 'i am delighted and wish the prince of wales and parker bowles a happy life.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'controversy and discussion erupted on internet forums on 28 february 2007, when publicity was given to essjay, a prominent wikipedia administrator and editor, having claimed false credentials which were published in a magazine. internet encyclopedia wikipedia co-founder jimbo wales was travelling in india, and at 06:42 on march 3 he issued a statement that further information had come to his attention and he had asked the editor to resign his positions of trust within the community. at 03:17 on march 4 essjay announced on his user talk page that he had retired and was no longer active on wikipedia.', 'hypothesis': 'wikipedia was launched by jimbo wales.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "the if awards are presented in hanover, germany, at the international forum design hannover gmbh. there are a number of fields and disciplines which have their own awards.tag heuer's monaco calibre 360 ls concept chronograph has won the award in the leisure/lifestyle category. the timepiece was chosen from over 2,200 watches from 35 countries. this prestigious award was given to the company for the second time in two years. last year the winner in the same category was tag heuer's professional golf watch, designed together with tiger woods. this year's winning timepiece from tag heuer has a mechanical movement, which represents the first in the history of watchmaking to reach a precision of 1/100th of a second. the watch itself is to be seen at the if design exhibition 2007, held in hanover, from march 15 till august.", 'hypothesis': 'tiger woods attends the if design exhibition 2007.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ["located just three miles from tullamore and only 45 minutes from the k club, venue of the 2006 ryder cup, is esker hills, a genuine hidden gem and one of irish golf's best kept secrets.\n The question is: the k club will host the 2006 ryder cup.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the duke of edinburgh and i are very happy that the prince of wales and mrs. parker bowles are to marry.\n The question is: i am delighted and wish the prince of wales and parker bowles a happy life.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'controversy and discussion erupted on internet forums on 28 february 2007, when publicity was given to essjay, a prominent wikipedia administrator and editor, having claimed false credentials which were published in a magazine. internet encyclopedia wikipedia co-founder jimbo wales was travelling in india, and at 06:42 on march 3 he issued a statement that further information had come to his attention and he had asked the editor to resign his positions of trust within the community. at 03:17 on march 4 essjay announced on his user talk page that he had retired and was no longer active on wikipedia.\n The question is: wikipedia was launched by jimbo wales.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the if awards are presented in hanover, germany, at the international forum design hannover gmbh. there are a number of fields and disciplines which have their own awards.tag heuer's monaco calibre 360 ls concept chronograph has won the award in the leisure/lifestyle category. the timepiece was chosen from over 2,200 watches from 35 countries. this prestigious award was given to the company for the second time in two years. last year the winner in the same category was tag heuer's professional golf watch, designed together with tiger woods. this year's winning timepiece from tag heuer has a mechanical movement, which represents the first in the history of watchmaking to reach a precision of 1/100th of a second. the watch itself is to be seen at the if design exhibition 2007, held in hanover, from march 15 till august.\n The question is: tiger woods attends the if design exhibition 2007.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

Examples ["located just three miles from tullamore and only 45 minutes from the k club, venue of the 2006 ryder cup, is esker hills, a genuine hidden gem and one of irish golf's best kept secrets.\n The question is: the k club will host the 2006 ryder cup.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the duke of edinburgh and i are very happy that the prince of wales and mrs. parker bowles are to marry.\n The question is: i am delighted and wish the prince of wales and parker bowles a happy life.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'controversy and discussion erupted on internet forums on 28 february 2007, when publicity was given to essjay, a prominent wikipedia administrator and editor, having claimed false credentials which were published in a magazine. internet encyclopedia wikipedia co-founder jimbo wales was travelling in india, and at 06:42 on march 3 he issued a statement that further information had come to his attention and he had asked the editor to resign his positions of trust within the community. at 03:17 on march 4 essjay announced on his user talk page that he had retired and was no longer active on wikipedia.\n The question is: wikipedia was launched by jimbo wales.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the if awards are presented in hanover, germany, at the international forum design hannover gmbh. there are a number of fields and disciplines which have their own awards.tag heuer's monaco calibre 360 ls concept chronograph has won the award in the leisure/lifestyle category. the timepiece was chosen from over 2,200 watches from 35 countries. this prestigious award was given to the company for the second time in two years. last year the winner in the same category was tag heuer's professional golf watch, designed together with tiger woods. this year's winning timepiece from tag heuer has a mechanical movement, which represents the first in the history of watchmaking to reach a precision of 1/100th of a second. the watch itself is to be seen at the if design exhibition 2007, held in hanover, from march 15 till august.\n The question is: tiger woods attends the if design exhibition 2007.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
Examples ["located just three miles from tullamore and only 45 minutes from the k club, venue of the 2006 ryder cup, is esker hills, a genuine hidden gem and one of irish golf's best kept secrets.\n The question is: the k club will host the 2006 ryder cup.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the duke of edinburgh and i are very happy that the prince of wales and mrs. parker bowles are to marry.\n The question is: i am delighted and wish the prince of wales and parker bowles a happy life.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'controversy and discussion erupted on internet forums on 28 february 2007, when publicity was given to essjay, a prominent wikipedia administrator and editor, having claimed false credentials which were published in a magazine. internet encyclopedia wikipedia co-founder jimbo wales was travelling in india, and at 06:42 on march 3 he issued a statement that further information had come to his attention and he had asked the editor to resign his positions of trust within the community. at 03:17 on march 4 essjay announced on his user talk page that he had retired and was no longer active on wikipedia.\n The question is: wikipedia was launched by jimbo wales.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the if awards are presented in hanover, germany, at the international forum design hannover gmbh. there are a number of fields and disciplines which have their own awards.tag heuer's monaco calibre 360 ls concept chronograph has won the award in the leisure/lifestyle category. the timepiece was chosen from over 2,200 watches from 35 countries. this prestigious award was given to the company for the second time in two years. last year the winner in the same category was tag heuer's professional golf watch, designed together with tiger woods. this year's winning timepiece from tag heuer has a mechanical movement, which represents the first in the history of watchmaking to reach a precision of 1/100th of a second. the watch itself is to be seen at the if design exhibition 2007, held in hanover, from march 15 till august.\n The question is: tiger woods attends the if design exhibition 2007.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

Examples ["located just three miles from tullamore and only 45 minutes from the k club, venue of the 2006 ryder cup, is esker hills, a genuine hidden gem and one of irish golf's best kept secrets.\n The question is: the k club will host the 2006 ryder cup.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the duke of edinburgh and i are very happy that the prince of wales and mrs. parker bowles are to marry.\n The question is: i am delighted and wish the prince of wales and parker bowles a happy life.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'controversy and discussion erupted on internet forums on 28 february 2007, when publicity was given to essjay, a prominent wikipedia administrator and editor, having claimed false credentials which were published in a magazine. internet encyclopedia wikipedia co-founder jimbo wales was travelling in india, and at 06:42 on march 3 he issued a statement that further information had come to his attention and he had asked the editor to resign his positions of trust within the community. at 03:17 on march 4 essjay announced on his user talk page that he had retired and was no longer active on wikipedia.\n The question is: wikipedia was launched by jimbo wales.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the if awards are presented in hanover, germany, at the international forum design hannover gmbh. there are a number of fields and disciplines which have their own awards.tag heuer's monaco calibre 360 ls concept chronograph has won the award in the leisure/lifestyle category. the timepiece was chosen from over 2,200 watches from 35 countries. this prestigious award was given to the company for the second time in two years. last year the winner in the same category was tag heuer's professional golf watch, designed together with tiger woods. this year's winning timepiece from tag heuer has a mechanical movement, which represents the first in the history of watchmaking to reach a precision of 1/100th of a second. the watch itself is to be seen at the if design exhibition 2007, held in hanover, from march 15 till august.\n The question is: tiger woods attends the if design exhibition 2007.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
Examples ["located just three miles from tullamore and only 45 minutes from the k club, venue of the 2006 ryder cup, is esker hills, a genuine hidden gem and one of irish golf's best kept secrets.\n The question is: the k club will host the 2006 ryder cup.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the duke of edinburgh and i are very happy that the prince of wales and mrs. parker bowles are to marry.\n The question is: i am delighted and wish the prince of wales and parker bowles a happy life.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'controversy and discussion erupted on internet forums on 28 february 2007, when publicity was given to essjay, a prominent wikipedia administrator and editor, having claimed false credentials which were published in a magazine. internet encyclopedia wikipedia co-founder jimbo wales was travelling in india, and at 06:42 on march 3 he issued a statement that further information had come to his attention and he had asked the editor to resign his positions of trust within the community. at 03:17 on march 4 essjay announced on his user talk page that he had retired and was no longer active on wikipedia.\n The question is: wikipedia was launched by jimbo wales.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the if awards are presented in hanover, germany, at the international forum design hannover gmbh. there are a number of fields and disciplines which have their own awards.tag heuer's monaco calibre 360 ls concept chronograph has won the award in the leisure/lifestyle category. the timepiece was chosen from over 2,200 watches from 35 countries. this prestigious award was given to the company for the second time in two years. last year the winner in the same category was tag heuer's professional golf watch, designed together with tiger woods. this year's winning timepiece from tag heuer has a mechanical movement, which represents the first in the history of watchmaking to reach a precision of 1/100th of a second. the watch itself is to be seen at the if design exhibition 2007, held in hanover, from march 15 till august.\n The question is: tiger woods attends the if design exhibition 2007.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

Examples ["located just three miles from tullamore and only 45 minutes from the k club, venue of the 2006 ryder cup, is esker hills, a genuine hidden gem and one of irish golf's best kept secrets.\n The question is: the k club will host the 2006 ryder cup.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the duke of edinburgh and i are very happy that the prince of wales and mrs. parker bowles are to marry.\n The question is: i am delighted and wish the prince of wales and parker bowles a happy life.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'controversy and discussion erupted on internet forums on 28 february 2007, when publicity was given to essjay, a prominent wikipedia administrator and editor, having claimed false credentials which were published in a magazine. internet encyclopedia wikipedia co-founder jimbo wales was travelling in india, and at 06:42 on march 3 he issued a statement that further information had come to his attention and he had asked the editor to resign his positions of trust within the community. at 03:17 on march 4 essjay announced on his user talk page that he had retired and was no longer active on wikipedia.\n The question is: wikipedia was launched by jimbo wales.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the if awards are presented in hanover, germany, at the international forum design hannover gmbh. there are a number of fields and disciplines which have their own awards.tag heuer's monaco calibre 360 ls concept chronograph has won the award in the leisure/lifestyle category. the timepiece was chosen from over 2,200 watches from 35 countries. this prestigious award was given to the company for the second time in two years. last year the winner in the same category was tag heuer's professional golf watch, designed together with tiger woods. this year's winning timepiece from tag heuer has a mechanical movement, which represents the first in the history of watchmaking to reach a precision of 1/100th of a second. the watch itself is to be seen at the if design exhibition 2007, held in hanover, from march 15 till august.\n The question is: tiger woods attends the if design exhibition 2007.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'seattle - apple inc., maker of macintosh computers and the iphone, reports fiscal second-quarter earnings wednesday after the closing bell. the following is a summary of key developments related to that period. overview: in january, apple founder steve jobs addressed the matter of his increasingly gaunt appearance — twice. he first said it was caused by an easily treatable hormone imbalance, and that he would remain at the helm. the next week, jobs, a cancer survivor, revealed the problem was more complicated and said he would take a medical leave of absence until the end of june. chief operating officer tim cook is running the company in his absence.', 'hypothesis': 'steve jobs is the creator of apple.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "he had been hand-picked by john sculley to take over steve jobs' position as head of the macintosh group.", 'hypothesis': 'john sculley was an executive of the macintosh group.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'brent frei, the co-founder of midmarket crm vendor onyx software corp., plans to step down as chief executive and chairman.', 'hypothesis': 'brent frei quits ceo position.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "us telecom giant at&t reported a nearly 10 percent drop in quarterly net profit on wednesday but beat expectations on a hefty increase in wireless revenue and improved performance by apple's iphone. net profit fell 9.7 percent in the first quarter compared with the same quarter last year to 3.12 billion us dollars while revenue fell 0.6 percent to 30.6 billion us dollars, the company said in a statement. earnings per share of 53 cents were better than the 48 cents per share expected by wall street analysts.", 'hypothesis': "iphone is a product of at&t's.", 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['seattle - apple inc., maker of macintosh computers and the iphone, reports fiscal second-quarter earnings wednesday after the closing bell. the following is a summary of key developments related to that period. overview: in january, apple founder steve jobs addressed the matter of his increasingly gaunt appearance — twice. he first said it was caused by an easily treatable hormone imbalance, and that he would remain at the helm. the next week, jobs, a cancer survivor, revealed the problem was more complicated and said he would take a medical leave of absence until the end of june. chief operating officer tim cook is running the company in his absence.\n The question is: steve jobs is the creator of apple.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "he had been hand-picked by john sculley to take over steve jobs' position as head of the macintosh group.\n The question is: john sculley was an executive of the macintosh group.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'brent frei, the co-founder of midmarket crm vendor onyx software corp., plans to step down as chief executive and chairman.\n The question is: brent frei quits ceo position.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "us telecom giant at&t reported a nearly 10 percent drop in quarterly net profit on wednesday but beat expectations on a hefty increase in wireless revenue and improved performance by apple's iphone. net profit fell 9.7 percent in the first quarter compared with the same quarter last year to 3.12 billion us dollars while revenue fell 0.6 percent to 30.6 billion us dollars, the company said in a statement. earnings per share of 53 cents were better than the 48 cents per share expected by wall street analysts.\n The question is: iphone is a product of at&t's.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'seattle - apple inc., maker of macintosh computers and the iphone, reports fiscal second-quarter earnings wednesday after the closing bell. the following is a summary of key developments related to that period. overview: in january, apple founder steve jobs addressed the matter of his increasingly gaunt appearance — twice. he first said it was caused by an easily treatable hormone imbalance, and that he would remain at the helm. the next week, jobs, a cancer survivor, revealed the problem was more complicated and said he would take a medical leave of absence until the end of june. chief operating officer tim cook is running the company in his absence.', 'hypothesis': 'steve jobs is the creator of apple.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "he had been hand-picked by john sculley to take over steve jobs' position as head of the macintosh group.", 'hypothesis': 'john sculley was an executive of the macintosh group.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'brent frei, the co-founder of midmarket crm vendor onyx software corp., plans to step down as chief executive and chairman.', 'hypothesis': 'brent frei quits ceo position.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "us telecom giant at&t reported a nearly 10 percent drop in quarterly net profit on wednesday but beat expectations on a hefty increase in wireless revenue and improved performance by apple's iphone. net profit fell 9.7 percent in the first quarter compared with the same quarter last year to 3.12 billion us dollars while revenue fell 0.6 percent to 30.6 billion us dollars, the company said in a statement. earnings per share of 53 cents were better than the 48 cents per share expected by wall street analysts.", 'hypothesis': "iphone is a product of at&t's.", 'label': 'true'}], [{'premise': 'seattle - Examples ['seattle - apple inc., maker of macintosh computers and the iphone, reports fiscal second-quarter earnings wednesday after the closing bell. the following is a summary of key developments related to that period. overview: in january, apple founder steve jobs addressed the matter of his increasingly gaunt appearance — twice. he first said it was caused by an easily treatable hormone imbalance, and that he would remain at the helm. the next week, jobs, a cancer survivor, revealed the problem was more complicated and said he would take a medical leave of absence until the end of june. chief operating officer tim cook is running the company in his absence.\n The question is: steve jobs is the creator of apple.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "he had been hand-picked by john sculley to take over steve jobs' position as head of the macintosh group.\n The question is: john sculley was an executive of the macintosh group.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "us telecom giant at&t reported a nearly 10 percent drop in quarterly net profit on wednesday but beat expectations on a hefty increase in wireless revenue and improved performance by apple's iphone. net profit fell 9.7 percent in the first quarter compared with the same quarter last year to 3.12 billion us dollars while revenue fell 0.6 percent to 30.6 billion us dollars, the company said in a statement. earnings per share of 53 cents were better than the 48 cents per share expected by wall street analysts.\n The question is: iphone is a product of at&t's.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
Examples ['seattle - apple inc., maker of macintosh computers and the iphone, reports fiscal second-quarter earnings wednesday after the closing bell. the following is a summary of key developments related to that period. overview: in january, apple founder steve jobs addressed the matter of his increasingly gaunt appearance — twice. he first said it was caused by an easily treatable hormone imbalance, and that he would remain at the helm. the next week, jobs, a cancer survivor, revealed the problem was more complicated and said he would take a medical leave of absence until the end of june. chief operating officer tim cook is running the company in his absence.\n The question is: steve jobs is the creator of apple.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]

Examples ['the program, financed with a grant from the un agency for international development, is aimed at reducing infant mortality in madagascar, an island nation in the indian ocean off the eastern coast of africa.\n The question is: the un agency for international development is an organisation based in madagascar.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a report prepared by a five member un commission noted "killing of civilians, enforced disappearances, destruction of villages, rape and other forms of sexual violence, pillaging and forced displacement, throughout darfur", and secretly named alleged war criminals that should go before the icc.\n The question is: more than 200,000 people were killed in the air attack in the darfur region.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the situation is being monitored by the world health organization but says "it is too early to know whether the virus is changing in ways that would signal the start of a human flu pandemic," says maria cheng a spokeswoman for the who. "it\'s one isolate from a single virus from turkey. the sample suggests the virus might be more inclined to bind to human cells rather than animal cells, but there\'s no evidence that it\'s becoming more infectious. if we started to see a lot more samples from turkey with this mutation and saw the virus changing, we\'d be more concerned."\n The question is: the world health organization is based in turkey.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'in sub-saharan africa about one in every 30 people is infected with hiv.', 'hypothesis': '30% of the people infected with hiv live in africa.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'in africa today, the majority of infected people acquire hiv by the time they are in their 20s or 30s and, on average, die within ten years.', 'hypothesis': '20-30 percent of people infected with hiv live in africa.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'in 1979, the very first cases of aids appeared in new york. cases of the disease that had never been seen prior to 1979, but is now considered more deadly than the bubonic plague, continued to surface in california and new york, almost exclusively in homosexual men.', 'hypothesis': 'aids spreads in africa.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the spread of aids in africa is driven not by unsafe sex but by unsafe medical practice, according to research published last week.', 'hypothesis': 'aids spreads in africa.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['in sub-saharan africa about one in every 30 people is infected with hiv.\n The question is: 30% of the people infected with hiv live in africa.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'in africa today, the majority of infected people acquire hiv by the time they are in their 20s or 30s and, on average, die within ten years.\n The question is: 20-30 percent of people infected with hiv live in africa.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'in 1979, the very first cases of aids appeared in new york. cases of the disease that had never been seen prior to 1979, but is now considered more deadly than the bubonic plague, continued to surface in california and new york, almost exclusively in homosexual men.\n The question is: aids spreads in africa.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the spread of aids in africa is driven not by unsafe sex but by unsafe medical practice, according to research published last week.\n The question is: aids spreads in africa.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'take consumer products giant procter and gamble. even with a $1.8 billion research and development budget, it still manages 500 active partnerships each year, many of them with small companies.', 'hypothesis': '500 small companies are partners of procter and gamble.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'japanese drug makers are now trying to build comprehensive independent operations in research and development, production and marketing.', 'hypothesis': 'there are companies that have split the management of their research and development processes.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.", 'hypothesis': 'pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.", 'hypothesis': "pfizer is the world's largest drug company.", 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['take consumer products giant procter and gamble. even with a $1.8 billion research and development budget, it still manages 500 active partnerships each year, many of them with small companies.\n The question is: 500 small companies are partners of procter and gamble.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'japanese drug makers are now trying to build comprehensive independent operations in research and development, production and marketing.\n The question is: there are companies that have split the management of their research and development processes.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.\n The question is: pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.\n The question is: pfizer is the world's largest drug company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'a continental connection flight from newark to buffalo crashed into a house about four to six miles from buffalo niagara international airport on thursday night, killing 50 people, officials said. continental airlines flight 3407 is a daily commuter flight from newark liberty international airport in newark, new jersey to buffalo, new york, operated under the continental connection brand by virginia-based regional airline colgan air.', 'hypothesis': 'a daily commuter flight crashed in new york.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'twenty-four people, among them seven children, were killed on sunday after their airplane crashed in a river in brazil. four people survived the crash, including a 9-year-old boy. the aircraft, which was a twin-engine embraer turboprop chartered by manaus aerotaxis, was carrying 26 passengers and two crew members when it crashed. the pilots of the plane, which had departed from coari, had supposedly contacted the air traffic control near their destination of manaus to announce  that they were turning back. the plane, however, then disappeared from radar. the plane made an emergency landing in the river manacapuru, a branch the  amazon river in the brazilian state of amazonas, 50 miles (80 kilometers) from manaus.', 'hypothesis': '24 people died in an airplane crash.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a small airplane crashed yesterday in southeast alaska, killing five and injuring four. alaska state troopers spokeswoman megan peters said that among the survivors is a two-year-old girl. ketchikan public safety director cove, an area about 25 miles north of ketchikan.', 'hypothesis': '25 people died in an airplane crash.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the plane involved in the incident was a bombardier dash 8, and four crew members died in the accident, as well as one person on the ground.', 'hypothesis': 'a plane crashed while flying on autopilot.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['a continental connection flight from newark to buffalo crashed into a house about four to six miles from buffalo niagara international airport on thursday night, killing 50 people, officials said. continental airlines flight 3407 is a daily commuter flight from newark liberty international airport in newark, new jersey to buffalo, new york, operated under the continental connection brand by virginia-based regional airline colgan air.\n The question is: a daily commuter flight crashed in new york.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'twenty-four people, among them seven children, were killed on sunday after their airplane crashed in a river in brazil. four people survived the crash, including a 9-year-old boy. the aircraft, which was a twin-engine embraer turboprop chartered by manaus aerotaxis, was carrying 26 passengers and two crew members when it crashed. the pilots of the plane, which had departed from coari, had supposedly contacted the air traffic control near their destination of manaus to announce  that they were turning back. the plane, however, then disappeared from radar. the plane made an emergency landing in the river manacapuru, a branch the  amazon river in the brazilian state of amazonas, 50 miles (80 kilometers) from manaus.\n The question is: 24 people died in an airplane crash.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a small airplane crashed yesterday in southeast alaska, killing five and injuring four. alaska state troopers spokeswoman megan peters said that among the survivors is a two-year-old girl. ketchikan public safety director rich leipfert told the ketchikan daily news that three of the injured were transported to hospitals. leipfert also said that the plane, belonging to seawind aviation, crashed into a tree at traitors cove, an area about 25 miles north of ketchikan.\n The question is: 25 people died in an airplane crash.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the plane involved in the incident was a bombardier dash 8, which crashed into a home located at 6038 long street in clarence center, a suburb of buffalo. it went down at approximately 10:17 p.m. est (03:20 utc), february 12. 44 passengers, an off-duty pilot, and four crew members died in the accident, as well as one person on the ground.\n The question is: a plane crashed while flying on autopilot.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['two bombs planted near an islamic school in pakistan killed eight people and injured 42 others yesterday in the latest outbreak of violence gripping the southern port of karachi.\n The question is: eight people planted two bombs near an islamic school in pakistan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "at least eight people have been killed in a suicide bomb attack on sri lanka's army headquarters, while the head of the army has been seriously injured. lt gen sarath fonseka is said to be in a stable condition after surgery in colombo, where the attack happened. the military has blamed tamil tiger rebels for the attack and launched air strikes on their positions in the east.\n The question is: people were killed in suicide attacks.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'winnenden, germany ―a teenage gunman killed 15 people, most of them female, on wednesday in a rampage that began at a school near stuttgart in southern germany and ended in a nearby town, where he then killed himself after the police wounded him. the attack left germany, which tightened tough gun controls after a similar attack at a school seven years ago, struggling to understand the carnage that had again befallen it, a country with relatively little violent crime. in 2002, a gunman killed 16 people before killing himself at a school in erfurt, in eastern germany.\n The question is: in 2002 near stuttgart a boy shot 16 people.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'police sources stated that during the bomb attack involving the shining path, two people were injured.\n The question is: two people were wounded by a bomb.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

outside a tampa nightclub, which she had been ejected from. she is charged with disorderly intoxication and resisting arrest.', 'hypothesis': 'sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".', underwood, who has gone on to have some success.", 'hypothesis': 'jessica sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'sierra was arrested on december 2 outside the baby whilst still in prison. sierra earlier pled not guilty to all charges.', 'hypothesis': 'jessica sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'on Examples ['sierra is likely to remain in jail at the hillsborough county jail in her native tampa until her next hearing on december 20, where she is being held without bail, which would prevent her attending the washington event on friday even if she still had permission to perform. sierra has been in jail since the start of the month after an altercation with police officers outside a tampa nightclub, which she had been ejected from. she is charged with disorderly intoxication and resisting arrest.\n The question is: sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'vivid spokesperson jackie markham has said the footage was created earlier this year and was purchased by the company two months ago from an unidentified third party. markham said jessica\'s attorney has not contacted them and she is unsure if any proceeds will reach sierra. the tape also shows her making abusive comments about other contestants, such as carrie underwood, who has gone on to have some success.\n The question is: jessica sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'sierra was arrested on december 2 outside a local bar, and is being held without bond. police claim that after they arrived, she first assaulted an officer then attempted to bribe him by offering to perform a sex act on him. only two weeks earlier she had pleaded no contest to charges of battery and possessing cocaine. if she is convicted of all the new charges, she could be imprisoned for up to 11 years, which would mean she would have the baby whilst still in prison. sierra earlier pled not guilty to all charges.\n The question is: jessica sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'on december 6 2008, adela lupse, presenting the call-in quiz telepremii on national tv on romanian television, had what the daily telegraph described as a "tantrum on air". as the final prize became available, ms lupse\'s show had no callers. already excited, she began to shout. throwing the telephone down on the studio floor and stomping on it, she admonished her viewers, "i want the telephone to ring now. now. call me now!".\n The question is: ms lupse is a tv presenter.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

outside a tampa nightclub, which she had been ejected from. she is charged with disorderly intoxication and resisting arrest.', 'hypothesis': 'sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "vivid spokesperson jackie markham has said the footage was created earlier this year and was purchased by the company two months ago from an unidentified third party. markham said jessica's attorney has not contacted them and she is unsure if any proceeds will reach sierra. the tape also shows her making abusive comments about other contestants, such as carrie underwood, who has gone on to have some success.", 'hypothesis': 'jessica sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'sierra was arrested on december 2 outside a local bar, and is being held without bond. police claim that after they arrived, she first assaulted an officer then attempted to bribe him by offering to perform a sex act on him. only two weeks earlier she had pleaded no contest to charges of battery and possessing cocaine. if she is convicted of all the new charges, she could be imprisoned for up to 11 years, which would mean she would have the baby whilst still in prison. sierra earlier pled not guilty to all charges.', 'hypothesis': 'jessica sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'on december 6 2008, adela lupse, presenting the call-in quiz telepremii on national tv on romanian television, had what the daily telegraph described as a "tantrum on air". as the final prize became available, ms lupse\'s show had no callers. already excited, she began to shout. throwing the telephone down on the studio floor and stomping on it, she admonished her viewers, "i want the telephone to ring now. now. call me now!".', 'hypothesis': 'ms lupse is a tv presenter.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['sierra is likely to remain in jail at the hillsborough county jail in her native tampa until her next hearing on december 20, where she is being held without bail, which would prevent her attending the washington event on friday even if she still had permission to perform. sierra has been in jail since the start of the month after an altercation with police officers outside a tampa nightclub, which she had been ejected from. she is charged with disorderly intoxication and resisting arrest.\n The question is: sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'vivid spokesperson jackie markham has said the footage was created earlier this year and was purchased by the company two months ago from an unidentified third party. markham said jessica\'s attorney has not contacted them and she is unsure if any proceeds will reach sierra. the tape also shows her making abusive comments about other contestants, such as carrie underwood, who has gone on to have some success.\n The question is: jessica sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'sierra was arrested on december 2 outside a local bar, and is being held without bond. police claim that after they arrived, she first assaulted an officer then attempted to bribe him by offering to perform a sex act on him. only two weeks earlier she had pleaded no contest to charges of battery and possessing cocaine. if she is convicted of all the new charges, she could be imprisoned for up to 11 years, which would mean she would have the baby whilst still in prison. sierra earlier pled not guilty to all charges.\n The question is: jessica sierra once reached the finals of "american idol".. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'on december 6 2008, adela lupse, presenting the call-in quiz telepremii on national tv on romanian television, had what the daily telegraph described as a "tantrum on air". as the final prize became available, ms lupse\'s show had no callers. already excited, she began to shout. throwing the telephone down on the studio floor and stomping on it, she admonished her viewers, "i want the telephone to ring now. now. call me now!".\n The question is: ms lupse is a tv presenter.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.', 'hypothesis': 'quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.', 'hypothesis': 'the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.', 'hypothesis': 'guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.", 'hypothesis': 'african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['animals are permitted to enter the uk 6 months later without quarantine as long as they have been treated for ticks, fleas and tapeworms between 24 and 48 hours before boarding the transport that will return the pets to the uk.\n The question is: quarantine is compulsory for animals to enter the uk.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport is a pink a4 sheet which contains the microchip number and certification that the dog has a rabies vaccination, and needs to be signed by a veterinary surgeon who has lvi status. the passport is not to be confused with the much smaller purple folder routinely issued by vets which records the complete vaccination history of the pet.\n The question is: the pet passport contains the complete vaccination history of pets.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the pet passport alone can be used to enter the uk, but it will not suffice to enter many countries. for instance guatemala, like almost every country, demands that all imported pets have a rabies vaccination, but will not accept the pet passport as proof of said vaccination.\n The question is: guatemala accepts the pet passport as proof of vaccination.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "tourists pay millions of dollars a year to come and see africa 's wildlife and smugglers pay millions more in strictly illegal purchases of ivory and rhino horn from poachers.\n The question is: african countries encourage keeping animals alive to attract tourists.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['the salt lake city 2002 winter olympics will take place from february 8th to february 24th 2002. the paralympics will take place in salt lake city from march 7th to march 16th 2002.\n The question is: 2002 olympic winter games take place in salt lake.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the eighth paralympic winter games are set to take place in salt lake city, utah. for only the second time the games are being held outside europe, following the 1998 winter paralympics in nagano, japan. and for the first time ever, there is just one combined organising committee for both the winter olympic and paralympic games. just 10 days after the winter olympics concludes, the paralympics will begin in the same venue.\n The question is: the 2002 olympic winter games took place in salt lake.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "olympic officials familiar with salt lake city's bid for the 2002 winter games have described in recent weeks a process by which salt lake city olympic officials targeted the votes of 17 african ioc members after losing by four votes to nagano, japan, for the right to play host to the 1998 winter olympics.\n The question is: before salt lake city, winter olympic games took place in nagano.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "to avoid further price-gouging, norway's ministry of government administration announced that it was freezing prices on lodging, food and beverages in the lillehammer area during the winter olympics.\n The question is: norway hosted the winter olympic games.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
ICL Examples [[{'premise': '"with oil prices at $90 a barrel and fear of recession in the uk and many other european economies, the current outlook for the coming fiscal year is poor. while it is impossible to accurately forecast full year fuel prices and yields this far in advance, there is now a significant chance that profits may decline next year," ryanair ceo michael o\'leary cautioned. ryanair said that it is not hedged against oil price increases for the next fiscal year. however, ryanair is not the only airline to suffer from the economic downturn. aer lingus shares are down 3% to €1722.30. easyjet has declined 11%. however shrewd, mr. o\'leary has plans to spend up to 200 million purchasing back shares in the company, which equates to 3% of the company share capital.', 'hypothesis': 'ryanair shares suffered a 3% decrease.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the philippine stock exchange composite index rose 0.1 percent to 1573.65.', 'hypothesis': 'the philippine stock exchange composite index dropped.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'personal computer maker, gateway inc., on monday, lowered its 2005 revenue and earnings forecast, sending its shares plunging 11 percent, as pricing in the industry became increasingly cut-throat.', 'hypothesis': 'gateway lowered its sales and earnings guidance for the year.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the media always talk about the dow being up or down a certain number of points.', 'hypothesis': 'dow jones is down.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['"with oil prices at $90 a barrel and fear of recession in the uk and many other european economies, the current outlook for the coming fiscal year is poor. while it is impossible to accurately forecast full year fuel prices and yields this far in advance, there is now a significant chance that profits may decline next year," ryanair ceo michael o\'leary cautioned. ryanair said that it is not hedged against oil price increases for the next fiscal year. however, ryanair is not the only airline to suffer from the economic downturn. aer lingus shares are down 3% to €1722.30. easyjet has declined 11%. however shrewd, mr. o\'leary has plans to spend up to 200 million purchasing back shares in the company, which equates to 3% of the company share capital.\n The question is: ryanair shares suffered a 3% decrease.. ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'the eighth paralympic winter games are set to take place in salt lake city, utah. for only the second time the games are being held outside europe, following the 1998 winter paralympics in nagano, japan. and for the first time ever, there is just one combined organising committee for both the winter olympic and paralympic games. just 10 days after the winter olympics concludes, the paralympics will begin in the same venue.', 'hypothesis': 'the 2002 olympic winter games took place in salt lake.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the salt lake city 2002 winter olympics will take place from february 8th to february 24th 2002. the paralympics will take place in salt lake city from march 7th to march 16th 2002.', 'hypothesis': '2002 olympic winter games take place in salt lake.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "olympic officials familiar with salt lake city's bid for the 2002 winter games have described in recent weeks a process by which salt lake city olympic officials targeted the votes of 17 african ioc members after losing by four votes to nagano, japan, for the right to play host to the 1998 winter olympics.", 'hypothesis': 'before salt lake city, winter olympic games took place in nagano.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "to avoid further price-gouging, norway's ministry of government administration announced that it was freezing prices on lodging, food and beverages in the lillehammer area during the winter olympics.", 'hypothesis': 'norway hosted the winter olympic games.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['the eighth paralympic winter games are set to take place in salt lake city, utah. for only the second time the games are being held outside europe, following the 1998 winter paralympics in nagano, japan. and for the first time ever, there is just one combined organising committee for both the winter olympic and paralympic games. just 10 days after the winter olympics concludes, the paralympics will begin in the same venue.\n The question is: the 2002 olympic winter games took place in salt lake.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the salt lake city 2002 winter olympics will take place from february 8th to february 24th 2002. the paralympics will take place in salt lake city from march 7th to march 16th 2002.\n The question is: 2002 olympic winter games take place in salt lake.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "olympic officials familiar with salt lake city's bid for the 2002 winter games have described in recent weeks a process by which salt lake city olympic officials targeted the votes of 17 african ioc members after losing by four votes to nagano, japan, for the right to play host to the 1998 winter olympics.\n The question is: before salt lake city, winter olympic games took place in nagano.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "to avoid further price-gouging, norway's ministry of government administration announced that it was freezing prices on lodging, food and beverages in the lillehammer area during the winter olympics.\n The question is: norway hosted the winter olympic games.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]

Examples ['the eighth paralympic winter games are set to take place in salt lake city, utah. for only the second time the games are being held outside europe, following the 1998 winter paralympics in nagano, japan. and for the first time ever, there is just one combined organising committee for both the winter olympic and paralympic games. just 10 days after the winter olympics concludes, the paralympics will begin in the same venue.\n The question is: the 2002 olympic winter games took place in salt lake.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
