ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'in 1962, armstrong was transferred to astronaut status. he served as command pilot for the gemini 8 mission, launched march 16, 1966, and along with david scott, performed the first successful docking of two vehicles in space by mating his gemini 8 with an uninhabited agena rocket.', 'hypothesis': 'neil armstrong was the first man who landed on the moon.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'neil armstrong was an aviator in the navy and was chosen with the second group of astronauts in 1962. made seven flights in the x-15 program (1960 photo), reaching an altitude of 207,500 feet. was backup command pilot for gemini 5, command pilot for gemini 8, backup command pilot for gemini 11, backup commander for apollo 8, and commander for apollo 11: successfully completing the first moonwalk.', 'hypothesis': 'neil armstrong was the first man who landed on the moon.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': '"if we could put a man on the moon within decades back in the 1960s, i think we can eliminate tb if we develop the will to do so" said o\'brien, who called for a significant investment for the research, particularly the large field trials necessary to demonstrate efficacy.', 'hypothesis': 'the moon was first touched by mankind in 1969.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the recovery of the capsule, which carried astronaut virgil "gus" grissom on a brief suborbital flight on july 21, 1961, took place on the 30th anniversary of mankind\'s first moon landing.', 'hypothesis': 'the moon was first touched by mankind in 1969.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['in 1962, armstrong was transferred to astronaut status. he served as command pilot for the gemini 8 mission, launched march 16, 1966, and along with david scott, performed the first successful docking of two vehicles in space by mating his gemini 8 with an uninhabited agena rocket.\n The question is: neil armstrong was the first man who landed on the moon.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'neil armstrong was an aviator in the navy and was chosen with the second group of astronauts in 1962. made seven flights in the x-15 program (1960 photo), reaching an altitude of 207,500 feet. was backup command pilot for gemini 5, command pilot for gemini 8, backup command pilot for gemini 11, backup commander for apollo 8, and commander for apollo 11: successfully completing the first moonwalk.\n The question is: neil armstrong was the first man who landed on the moon.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', '"if we could put a man on the moon within decades back in the 1960s, i think we can eliminate tb if we develop the will to do so" said o\'brien, who called for a significant investment for the research, particularly the large field trials necessary to demonstrate efficacy.\n The question is: the moon was first touched by mankind in 1969.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the recovery of the capsule, which carried astronaut virgil "gus" grissom on a brief suborbital flight on july 21, 1961, took place on the 30th anniversary of mankind\'s first moon landing.\n The question is: the moon was first touched by mankind in 1969.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

"he just refused to eat and that was his plan," bill werber jr. told the associated press. he added that his father was "sharp up until four weeks ago".\n The question is: werber died in north carolina at the age of 100.. Examples ['nokia, texas instruments and other leading makers of mobile phones have formally complained to brussels that qualcomm, the us mobile chipmaker, has unfairly used its patents on 3g technologies.\n The question is: nokia produces mobile chips.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'announced early wednesday morning at nokia\'s goevent, in a plan to expand the company\'s revenue, finland-based company nokia inc. is developing a mobile phone similar to its rival iphone, which will be available in the near future for nokia customers. the phone is expected to be available by 2008. most of the features are the same as the iphone\'s. they include music, games, and many other features, even ones that the iphone may not have. ovi (in finnish meaning "door") will be the door for more than 2 million songs and games available for download on the new device. users will be able to download wirelessly in their own home or anywhere there is access to a computer.\n The question is: nokia is a company based in finland.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "us telecom giant at&t reported a nearly 10 percent drop in quarterly net profit on wednesday but beat expectations on a hefty increase in wireless revenue and improved performance by apple's iphone. net profit fell 9.7 percent in the first quarter compared with the same quarter last year to 3.12 billion us dollars while revenue fell 0.6 percent to 30.6 billion us dollars, the company said in a statement. earnings per share of 53 cents were better than the 48 cents per share expected by wall street analysts.\n The question is: iphone is a product of at&t's.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'earlier this year, kai-uwe ricke, chief executive of deutsche telekom, floated the possibility that t-mobile usa might be sold.\n The question is: deutsche telekom sold t-mobile usa.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ["the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler Examples ["the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the automobile industry, led by general motors and ford, offered price discounts from june-august that temporarily boosted sales, but these discounts may have masked underlying weakness.\n The question is: ford is part of the automobile industry.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the republic of tajikistan, which declared independence from the soviet union in 1991, is in a region that has changed hands many times.\n The question is: the soviet union collapsed in 1991.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
Examples ["the obama administration has told chrysler it would provide as much as $6 billion in new financing, on top of the $4 billion in loans it has already given the company, if chrysler could complete a deal by next thursday with a cost structure that gives it a chance of survival. the creditors have, so far, balked at the terms suggested by the treasury department. but the negotiations have taken a new direction. treasury now has an agreement in principle with the uaw, whose members' pensions and retiree health care benefits would be protected in the event of a bankruptcy filing, said the people with knowledge of the discussions. moreover, under this scenario, fiat would complete its alliance with chrysler while the company is under bankruptcy protection.\n The question is: fiat wants to acquire some stakes in chrysler.. ICL Examples [[{'premise': "medium-size black holes actually do exist, according to the latest findings from nasa's hubble space telescope, but scientists had to look in some unexpected places to find them. the previously undiscovered black holes provide an important link that sheds light on the way in which black holes grow.", 'hypothesis': 'hubble discovers black holes.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'hubble is helping astronomers precisely calculate the age of the universe by providing accurate distances to galaxies, an important prerequisite for calculating age. hubble measures the distances to neighboring galaxies by finding accurate "milepost markers," a special class of pulsating star called cepheid variables. these, in turn, are being used to calibrate more remote milepost markers.', 'hypothesis': 'hubble discovers black holes.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the discovery is based on velocity measurements of a whirlpool of hot gas orbiting the black hole.', 'hypothesis': 'hubble discovers black holes.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'hubble is one of the most remarkable facilities in the entire history of science.', 'hypothesis': 'hubble is a space telescope.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ["medium-size black holes actually do exist, according to the latest findings from nasa's hubble space telescope, but scientists had to look in some unexpected places to find them. the previously undiscovered black holes provide an important link that sheds light on the way in which black holes grow.\n The question is: hubble discovers black holes.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'hubble is helping astronomers precisely calculate the age of the universe by providing accurate distances to galaxies, an important prerequisite for calculating age. hubble measures the distances to neighboring galaxies by finding accurate "milepost markers," a special class of pulsating star called cepheid variables. these, in turn, are being used to calibrate more remote milepost markers.\n The question is: hubble discovers black holes.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the discovery is based on velocity measurements of a whirlpool of hot gas orbiting the black hole.\n The question is: hubble discovers black holes.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hubble is one of the most remarkable facilities in the entire history of science.\n The question is: hubble is a space telescope.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': "new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.", 'hypothesis': 'pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.', 'hypothesis': 'insurance companies cover prescription drugs.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.", 'hypothesis': "pfizer is the world's largest drug company.", 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.', 'hypothesis': 'companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ["new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.\n The question is: pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.\n The question is: insurance companies cover prescription drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.\n The question is: pfizer is the world's largest drug company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.\n The question is: companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

ICL Examples [[{'premise': "japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is promoting over a rival standard pushed by sony corp.", 'hypothesis': "toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.", 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.', 'hypothesis': 'tmgo is the tallest building in japan.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.", 'hypothesis': 'toyota motor is located in toyota city.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.", 'hypothesis': '82 million people live in germany.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ["japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is promoting over a rival standard pushed by sony corp.\n The question is: toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.\n The question is: tmgo is the tallest building in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.\n The question is: toyota motor is located in toyota city.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.\n The question is: 82 million people live in germany.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]

rival standard pushed by sony corp.", 'hypothesis': "toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.", 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.', 'hypothesis': 'tmgo is the tallest building in japan.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.", 'hypothesis': 'toyota motor is located in toyota city.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.", 'hypothesis': '82 million people live in germany.', 'label': 'true'}], [{'premise': "japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is promoting over a rival standard pushed by sony corp.", 'hypothesis': "toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.", 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.', 'hypothesis': 'tmgo is the tallest building in japan.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.", 'hypothesis': 'toyota motor is located in toyota city.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.", 'hypothesis': '82 million people live in germany.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ["japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is promoting over a rival standard pushed by sony corp.\n The question is: toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.\n The question is: tmgo is the tallest building in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.\n The question is: toyota motor is located in toyota city.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.\n The question is: 82 million people live in germany.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
Examples ["japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is promoting over a rival standard pushed by sony corp.\n The question is: toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.\n The question is: tmgo is the tallest building in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.\n The question is: toyota motor is located in toyota city.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.\n The question is: 82 million people live in germany.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]

germany.', 'label': 'false'}], [{'premise': "japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.', 'hypothesis': 'tmgo is the tallest building in japan.', downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing people live in germany.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ["japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is promoting over a rival standard pushed by sony corp.\n The question is: toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.\n The question is: tmgo is the tallest building in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.\n The question is: toyota motor is located in toyota city.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.\n The question is: 82 million people live in germany.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]
Examples ["japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is promoting over a rival standard pushed by sony corp.\n The question is: toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.\n The question is: tmgo is the tallest building in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.\n The question is: toyota motor is located in toyota city.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.\n The question is: 82 million people live in germany.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

Examples ["japan's toshiba corp. announced tuesday that it has developed the first laptop computer with its new hd dvd drive: a next-generation disc format it is promoting over a rival standard pushed by sony corp.\n The question is: toshiba corp.'s headquarters is in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the tallest building in tokyo and the second tallest building in japan, the tmgo was conceived as a high-tech center from which tokyo could be led into the promising twenty-first century.\n The question is: tmgo is the tallest building in japan.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "the city retains its spotless streets, immaculate shops and nonexistent crime rate. since the slowdown, only one manufacturing company has gone bankrupt, says the city's chamber of commerce and industry, because toyota spread out orders among many of the more than 400 auto parts factories in the city, to keep them afloat through hard times. nonetheless, toyota's downturn has rippled through the city's economy, idling many smaller auto-related suppliers, which also cut payrolls, mainly by refusing to renew the contracts of short-term workers. after losing their jobs, many of the city's 16,400 foreign residents, mostly ethnic japanese from brazil and latin america, packed up and left, residents and city officials said.\n The question is: toyota motor is located in toyota city.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", "muslims make up some 3.2 million of germany's 82 million people, and turks represent two thirds of the minority.\n The question is: 82 million people live in germany.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]
ICL Examples [[{'premise': "tropical storm arthur is projected to weaken tonight, but it will likely regain strength after entering the bay of campeche on sunday.the 2008 atlantic  hurricane season got off to an early start today when a tropical storm formed off the coast of belize, one day before the season officially begins. tropical storm arthur formed saturday afternoon and quickly made landfall at the yucatan peninsula, near the border between belize and mexico. both  countries issued a tropical storm warning for the peninsula's eastern coastline. in the mexican state of quintana roo, ports were closed to small boats,  water sports were banned, and those living in coastal areas were encouraged to take precautions.", 'hypothesis': 'tropical storm arthur is approaching the us coast.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'meteorological observations suggest claudette remained a tropical storm as she affected parts of west texas.', 'hypothesis': 'a tropical storm has caused significant property damage.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'as hurricane katrina moves beyond the floridian peninsula, death tolls have begun to surface. on friday, the official count was seven dead, at least five missing. 4 people in broward, 3 in miami. the forecast for hurricane  katrina predicts that it will continue on its present northwesterly course and approach the panhandle of florida and the mississippi delta region in the next few days.', 'hypothesis': 'hurricane katrina hit florida.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "hurricane isabel was a tropical storm when she entered virginia, but caused damage to 75% of the state, making it one of the costliest disasters in virginia's history.", 'hypothesis': 'a tropical storm has caused significant property damage or loss of life.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ["tropical storm arthur is projected to weaken tonight, but it will likely regain strength after entering the bay of campeche on sunday.the 2008 atlantic  hurricane season got off to an early start today when a tropical storm formed off the coast of belize, one day before the season officially begins. tropical storm arthur formed saturday afternoon and quickly made landfall at the yucatan peninsula, near the border between belize and mexico. both  countries issued a tropical storm warning for the peninsula's eastern coastline. in the mexican state of quintana roo, ports were closed to small boats,  water sports were banned, and those living in coastal areas were encouraged to take precautions.\n The question is: tropical storm arthur is approaching the us coast.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'meteorological observations suggest claudette remained a tropical storm as she affected parts of west texas.\n The question is: a tropical storm has caused significant property damage.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'as hurricane katrina moves beyond the floridian peninsula, death tolls have begun to surface. on friday, the official count was seven dead, at least five missing. 4 people in broward, 3 in miami. the forecast for hurricane  katrina predicts that it will continue on its present northwesterly course and approach the panhandle of florida and the mississippi delta region in the next few days.\n The question is: hurricane katrina hit florida.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "hurricane isabel was a tropical storm when she entered virginia, but caused damage to 75% of the state, making it one of the costliest disasters in virginia's history.\n The question is: a tropical storm has caused significant property damage or loss of life.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'two bombs planted near an islamic school in pakistan killed eight people and injured 42 others yesterday in the latest outbreak of violence gripping the southern port of karachi.', 'hypothesis': '42 people killed in karachi bomb attack.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.', 'hypothesis': 'a civilian was killed by a car bomb.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a rocket attack killed two israelis, including a 3-year-old boy.', 'hypothesis': 'a three-year-old was killed in a rocket attack.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "on tuesday morning police in bangladesh have blamed islamic militants for what's believed to be the country's first suicide bombings. up to ten people were killed and dozens of others injured in the two attacks. the attacks left at least 50 people wounded with many of them said to be in critical condition. the government has accused the hardline jamayetul mujahideen, which wants to introduce strict islamic law in the muslim-majority democracy, of staging the attacks targeting the legal system. bangladesh police have arrested six men, including a suicide squad member in different parts of the country, in the last two days.", 'hypothesis': 'two people were killed in bangladesh.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['two bombs planted near an islamic school in pakistan killed eight people and injured 42 others yesterday in the latest outbreak of violence gripping the southern port of karachi.\n The question is: 42 people killed in karachi bomb attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.\n The question is: a civilian was killed by a car bomb.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a rocket attack killed two israelis, including a 3-year-old boy.\n The question is: a three-year-old was killed in a rocket attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "on tuesday morning police in bangladesh have blamed islamic militants for what's believed to be the country's first suicide bombings. up to ten people were killed and dozens of others injured in the two attacks. the attacks left at least 50 people wounded with many of them said to be in critical condition. the government has accused the hardline jamayetul mujahideen, which wants to introduce strict islamic law in the muslim-majority democracy, of staging the attacks targeting the legal system. bangladesh police have arrested six men, including a suicide squad member in different parts of the country, in the last two days.\n The question is: two people were killed in bangladesh.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'two bombs planted near an islamic school in pakistan killed eight people and injured 42 others yesterday in the latest outbreak of violence gripping the southern port of karachi.', 'hypothesis': '42 people killed in karachi bomb attack.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.', 'hypothesis': 'a civilian was killed by a car bomb.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'a rocket attack killed two israelis, including a 3-year-old boy.', 'hypothesis': 'a three-year-old was killed in a rocket attack.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "on tuesday morning police in bangladesh have blamed islamic militants for what's believed to be the country's first suicide bombings. up to ten people were killed and dozens of others injured in the two attacks. the attacks left at least 50 people wounded with many of them said to be in critical condition. the government has accused the hardline jamayetul mujahideen, which wants to introduce strict islamic law in the muslim-majority democracy, of staging the attacks targeting the legal system. bangladesh police have arrested six men, including a suicide squad member in different parts of the country, in the last two days.", 'hypothesis': 'two people were killed in bangladesh.', 'label': 'true'}], [{'premise': 'two bombs planted near an islamic school in pakistan killed eight people and injured 42 others yesterday in the latest outbreak of violence gripping the southern port of karachi.', 'hypothesis': '42 people killed in karachi bomb attack.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.', Examples ['two bombs planted near an islamic school in pakistan killed eight people and injured 42 others yesterday in the latest outbreak of violence gripping the southern port of karachi.\n The question is: 42 people killed in karachi bomb attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.\n The question is: a civilian was killed by a car bomb.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a rocket attack killed two israelis, including a 3-year-old boy.\n The question is: a three-year-old was killed in a rocket attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "on tuesday morning police in bangladesh have blamed islamic militants for what's believed to be the country's first suicide bombings. up to ten people were killed and dozens of others injured in the two attacks. the attacks left at least 50 people wounded with many of them said to be in critical condition. the government has accused the hardline jamayetul mujahideen, which wants to introduce strict islamic law in the muslim-majority democracy, of staging the attacks targeting the legal system. bangladesh police have arrested six men, including a suicide squad member in different parts of the country, in the last two days.\n The question is: two people were killed in bangladesh.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
Examples ['two bombs planted near an islamic school in pakistan killed eight people and injured 42 others yesterday in the latest outbreak of violence gripping the southern port of karachi.\n The question is: 42 people killed in karachi bomb attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.\n The question is: a civilian was killed by a car bomb.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a rocket attack killed two israelis, including a 3-year-old boy.\n The question is: a three-year-old was killed in a rocket attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "on tuesday morning police in bangladesh have blamed islamic militants for what's believed to be the country's first suicide bombings. up to ten people were killed and dozens of others injured in the two attacks. the attacks left at least 50 people wounded with many of them said to be in critical condition. the government has accused the hardline jamayetul mujahideen, which wants to introduce strict islamic law in the muslim-majority democracy, of staging the attacks targeting the legal system. bangladesh police have arrested six men, including a suicide squad member in different parts of the country, in the last two days.\n The question is: two people were killed in bangladesh.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]

Examples ['two bombs planted near an islamic school in pakistan killed eight people and injured 42 others yesterday in the latest outbreak of violence gripping the southern port of karachi.\n The question is: 42 people killed in karachi bomb attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.\n The question is: a civilian was killed by a car bomb.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a rocket attack killed two israelis, including a 3-year-old boy.\n The question is: a three-year-old was killed in a rocket attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "on tuesday morning police in bangladesh have blamed islamic militants for what's believed to be the country's first suicide bombings. up to ten people were killed and dozens of others injured in the two attacks. the attacks left at least 50 people wounded with many of them said to be in critical condition. the government has accused the hardline jamayetul mujahideen, which wants to introduce strict islamic law in the muslim-majority democracy, of staging the attacks targeting the legal system. bangladesh police have arrested six men, including a suicide squad member in different parts of the country, in the last two days.\n The question is: two people were killed in bangladesh.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false"]

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', '"the extraditables" have claimed responsibility for the murder of two employees of bogota\'s daily el espectador perpetrated today in medellin, where two other el espectator people, miguel soler rodriguez and martha luz lopez, were killed today in separate attacks carried out by gunmen.\n The question is: miguel soler rodriguez and martha luz lopez were killed by two employees of bogota\'s daily el espectador.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'alleged terrorists today, killed dolores hinostroza, the mayor of mulqui district, shooting her five times.\n The question is: the mayor of mulqui district was murdered with a firearm.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

ICL Examples [[{'premise': '"i guess you have to expect this in a growing community," said mardelle kean, who lives across the street from john joseph famalaro, charged in the death of denise a. huber, who was 23 when she disappeared in 1991.', 'hypothesis': 'john j. famalaro is accused of having killed denise a. huber.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the father of an oxnard teenager accused of gunning down a gay classmate who was romantically attracted to him has been found dead, ventura county authorities said today.  bill mcinerney, 45, was found shortly before 8 a.m. in the living room of his silver strand home by a friend, said james baroni, ventura county\'s chief deputy medical examiner. the friend was supposed to drive him to a court hearing in his son\'s murder trial, baroni said.  mcinerney\'s 15-year-old son, brandon, is accused of murder and a hate crime in the feb. 12, 2008, shooting death of classmate lawrence "larry" king, 15. the two boys had been sparring in the days before the killing, allegedly because larry had expressed a romantic interest in brandon.', 'hypothesis': 'bill mcinerney is accused of killing a gay teenager.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "jessica litman, a law professor at michigan's wayne state university, has specialized in copyright law and internet law for more than 20 years.", 'hypothesis': 'jessica litman is a law professor.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'on friday, james appeared in a santa barbara, california court for arraignment on charges of kidnapping and murdering a 15-year-old boy. james will plead not guilty, according to his attorney, james e. blatt. blatt also criticized the portrait prosecutors had painted of his client. "have you ever seen a 20 year-old mastermind? he was not the shooter. he was not at the scene," said blatt.', 'hypothesis': 'james e. blatt killed a 15-year-old-boy in california.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['"i guess you have to expect this in a growing community," said mardelle kean, who lives across the street from john joseph famalaro, charged in the death of denise a. huber, who was 23 when she disappeared in 1991.\n The question is: john j. famalaro is accused of having killed denise a. huber.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the father of an oxnard teenager accused of gunning down a gay classmate who was romantically attracted to him has been found dead, ventura county authorities said today.  bill mcinerney, 45, was found shortly before 8 a.m. in the living room of his silver strand home by a friend, said james baroni, ventura county\'s chief deputy medical examiner. the friend was supposed to drive him to a court hearing in his son\'s murder trial, baroni said.  mcinerney\'s 15-year-old son, brandon, is accused of murder and a hate crime in the feb. 12, 2008, shooting death of classmate lawrence "larry" king, 15. the two boys had been sparring in the days before the killing, allegedly because larry had expressed a romantic interest in brandon.\n The question is: bill mcinerney is accused of killing a gay teenager.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "jessica litman, a law professor at michigan's wayne state university, has specialized in copyright law and internet law for more than 20 years.\n The question is: jessica litman is a law professor.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'on friday, james appeared in a santa barbara, california court for arraignment on charges of kidnapping and murdering a 15-year-old boy. james will plead not guilty, according to his attorney, james e. blatt. blatt also criticized the portrait prosecutors had painted of his client. "have you ever seen a 20 year-old mastermind? he was not the shooter. he was not at the scene," said blatt.\n The question is: james e. blatt killed a 15-year-old-boy in california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the father of an oxnard teenager accused of gunning down a gay classmate who was romantically attracted to him has been found dead, ventura county authorities said today.  bill mcinerney, 45, was found shortly before 8 a.m. in the living room of his silver strand home by a friend, said james baroni, ventura county\'s chief deputy medical examiner. the friend was supposed to drive him to a court hearing in his son\'s murder trial, baroni said.  mcinerney\'s 15-year-old son, brandon, is accused of murder and a hate crime in the feb. 12, 2008, shooting death of classmate lawrence "larry" king, 15. the two boys had been sparring in the days before the killing, allegedly because larry had expressed a romantic interest in brandon.\n The question is: bill mcinerney is accused of killing a gay teenager.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "jessica litman, a law professor at michigan's wayne state university, has specialized in copyright law and internet law for more than 20 years.\n The question is: jessica litman is a law professor.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'on friday, james appeared in a santa barbara, california court for arraignment on charges of kidnapping and murdering a 15-year-old boy. james will plead not guilty, according to his attorney, james e. blatt. blatt also criticized the portrait prosecutors had painted of his client. "have you ever seen a 20 year-old mastermind? he was not the shooter. he was not at the scene," said blatt.\n The question is: james e. blatt killed a 15-year-old-boy in california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the father of an oxnard teenager accused of gunning down a gay classmate who was romantically attracted to him has been found dead, ventura county authorities said today.  bill mcinerney, 45, was found shortly before 8 a.m. in the living room of his silver strand home by a friend, said james baroni, ventura county\'s chief deputy medical examiner. the friend was supposed to drive him to a court hearing in his son\'s murder trial, baroni said.  mcinerney\'s 15-year-old son, brandon, is accused of murder and a hate crime in the feb. 12, 2008, shooting death of classmate lawrence "larry" king, 15. the two boys had been sparring in the days before the killing, allegedly because larry had expressed a romantic interest in brandon.\n The question is: bill mcinerney is accused of killing a gay teenager.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "jessica litman, a law professor at michigan's wayne state university, has specialized in copyright law and internet law for more than 20 years.\n The question is: jessica litman is a law professor.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'on friday, james appeared in a santa barbara, california court for arraignment on charges of kidnapping and murdering a 15-year-old boy. james will plead not guilty, according to his attorney, james e. blatt. blatt also criticized the portrait prosecutors had painted of his client. "have you ever seen a 20 year-old mastermind? he was not the shooter. he was not at the scene," said blatt.\n The question is: james e. blatt killed a 15-year-old-boy in california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['"i guess you have to expect this in a growing community," said mardelle kean, who lives across the street from john joseph famalaro, charged in the death of denise a. huber, who was 23 when she disappeared in 1991.\n The question is: john j. famalaro is accused of having killed denise a. huber.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the father of an oxnard teenager accused of gunning down a gay classmate who was romantically attracted to him has been found dead, ventura county authorities said today.  bill mcinerney, 45, was found shortly before 8 a.m. in the living room of his silver strand home by a friend, said james baroni, ventura county\'s chief deputy medical examiner. the friend was supposed to drive him to a court hearing in his son\'s murder trial, baroni said.  mcinerney\'s 15-year-old son, brandon, is accused of murder and a hate crime in the feb. 12, 2008, shooting death of classmate lawrence "larry" king, 15. the two boys had been sparring in the days before the killing, allegedly because larry had expressed a romantic interest in brandon.\n The question is: bill mcinerney is accused of killing a gay teenager.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "jessica litman, a law professor at michigan's wayne state university, has specialized in copyright law and internet law for more than 20 years.\n The question is: jessica litman is a law professor.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'on friday, james appeared in a santa barbara, california court for arraignment on charges of kidnapping and murdering a 15-year-old boy. james will plead not guilty, according to his attorney, james e. blatt. blatt also criticized the portrait prosecutors had painted of his client. "have you ever seen a 20 year-old mastermind? he was not the shooter. he was not at the scene," said blatt.\n The question is: james e. blatt killed a 15-year-old-boy in california.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'the west has preferred to focus on endangered animals, rather than endangered humans. african elephants are hunted down and stripped of tusks and hidden by poachers. their numbers in africa slumped from 1.2m to 600,000 in a decade until cites - the convention on international trade in endangered species - banned the trade in ivory.', 'hypothesis': 'the african elephant population was decimated by poachers.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a report by the africanelephant specialist group, which is responsible for monitoring the conservation of the elephants,concludes that elephant poaching has increased despite the 1989 international ban on ivory trading', 'hypothesis': 'the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'banning ivory is the surest road to extinction for the african elephant, argue leaders in those countries.', 'hypothesis': 'the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'thanks to a global ban on the ivory trade that was passed in 1989 by the convention on international trade in endangered species of wild fauna and flora (cites), the african elephant population may be reversing its spiral toward extinction', 'hypothesis': 'the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.', 'label': 'true'}]]

ICL Examples [[{'premise': "new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.", 'hypothesis': 'pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.', 'hypothesis': 'companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.", 'hypothesis': "pfizer is the world's largest drug company.", 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.', 'hypothesis': 'insurance companies cover prescription drugs.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ["new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.\n The question is: pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.\n The question is: companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.\n The question is: pfizer is the world's largest drug company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.\n The question is: insurance companies cover prescription drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ["new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.\n The question is: pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.\n The question is: companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.\n The question is: pfizer is the world's largest drug company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.\n The question is: insurance companies cover prescription drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
Examples ["new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.\n The question is: pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.\n The question is: companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.\n The question is: pfizer is the world's largest drug company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.\n The question is: insurance companies cover prescription drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ["new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.\n The question is: pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.\n The question is: companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.\n The question is: pfizer is the world's largest drug company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.\n The question is: insurance companies cover prescription drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
Examples ["new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.\n The question is: pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.\n The question is: companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.\n The question is: pfizer is the world's largest drug company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.\n The question is: insurance companies cover prescription drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ["new york - (business wire) pfizer inc announced today that it has become the first pharmaceutical company to be accredited by the association for the accreditation of human research protection programs (aahrpp) for ensuring the protection of human subjects taking part in early-stage clinical trials. the aahrpp accreditation was awarded to pfizer's clinical research units (crus) in new haven, ct, brussels, belgium and singapore, where the company conducts most of its phase i clinical research. to earn the accreditation, pfizer participated in a rigorous, 15-month examination of the clinical research practices at these units.\n The question is: pfizer is a pharmaceutical company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'companies are working to reduce the interval between drug discovery and marketing.\n The question is: companies are working to shorten the new drug development period to an average of eight to nine years in the us.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "pfizer has reached a broad agreement to pay millions of dollars to nigeria's kano state to settle a criminal case alleging that the drug company illegally tested an experimental drug on gravely ill children during a 1996 meningitis epidemic. the details remain private, but sources close to the negotiations said the total payments -- including those to the children, their families, the government and the government's attorneys -- would be about $75 million under the current settlement terms. other details, including how the money will be distributed, are to be worked out within weeks.\n The question is: pfizer is the world's largest drug company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in 1997, insurance companies paid out $51.6 billion for prescription drugs.\n The question is: insurance companies cover prescription drugs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'forty-five percent of the bills examined were bipartisan, and 85 percent of the reviewed bills had republican lead sponsors. 8221; small business owners are disappointed by the republican track record, particularly the lack of productivity in the senate.', 'hypothesis': 'the senate is the least productive.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'in a statement in the washington times, the executive director of 21st century democrats, mark lotwis, called the lawsuit "frivolous" and said: "we\'re going to defend our organization\'s integrity". landmark education spokeswoman deborah beroset said that the landmark forum "is in no way religious in nature and any claim to the contrary is simply absurd," and stated: "while we are not a party to this lawsuit and have no firsthand knowledge of it, we can only assume that we are being used as a legal and political football to further the plaintiff"s own financial interests." the new york lawsuit was filed april 14, and is still in early filing stages. a conference with the federal court judge in the case has been scheduled for june 17.', 'hypothesis': 'mark lotwis is a democrat.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'while the house has been extremely active in passing bills addressing the key priorities of entrepreneurs, most of the legislation has hit a brick wall over in the senate.', 'hypothesis': 'the house quickly passes bills addressing the priorities of entrepreneurs.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "in november, the results of the 2008 united states senate election in minnesota showed republican norm coleman with a 215 vote lead over the democratic challenger franken. the close margin ―less than 0.0075 percent ―triggered an automatic recount which resulted in franken leading by 225 votes, the total ratified by the minnesota canvasing board january 5. the coleman campaign filed a motion january 6 in court to block the certification of franken's victory and prevent franken from taking a seat in the united states senate. on march 31, a three-judge panel hearing the case ordered 400 additional ballots be counted.", 'hypothesis': 'norm coleman is a member of the republican party.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['forty-five percent of the bills examined were bipartisan, and 85 percent of the reviewed bills had republican lead sponsors. 8221; small business owners are disappointed by the republican track record, particularly the lack of productivity in the senate.\n The question is: the senate is the least productive.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'in a statement in the washington times, the executive director of 21st century democrats, mark lotwis, called the lawsuit "frivolous" and said: "we\'re going to defend our organization\'s integrity". landmark education spokeswoman deborah beroset said that the landmark forum "is in no way religious in nature and any claim to the contrary is simply absurd," and stated: "while we are not a party to this lawsuit and have no firsthand knowledge of it, we can only assume that we are being used as a legal and political football to further the plaintiff"s own financial interests." the new york lawsuit was filed april 14, and is still in early filing stages. a conference with the federal court judge in the case has been scheduled for june 17.\n The question is: mark lotwis is a democrat.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'while the house has been extremely active in passing bills addressing the key priorities of entrepreneurs, most of the legislation has hit a brick wall over in the senate.\n The question is: the house quickly passes bills addressing the priorities of entrepreneurs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "in november, the results of the 2008 united states senate election in minnesota showed republican norm coleman with a 215 vote lead over the democratic challenger franken. the close margin ―less than 0.0075 percent ―triggered an automatic recount which resulted in franken leading by 225 votes, the total ratified by the minnesota canvasing board january 5. the coleman campaign filed a motion january 6 in court to block the certification of franken's victory and prevent franken from taking a seat in the united states senate. on march 31, a three-judge panel hearing the case ordered 400 additional ballots be counted.\n The question is: norm coleman is a member of the republican party.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]

Examples ['forty-five percent of the bills examined were bipartisan, and 85 percent of the reviewed bills had republican lead sponsors. 8221; small business owners are disappointed by the republican track record, particularly the lack of productivity in the senate.\n The question is: the senate is the least productive.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'in a statement in the washington times, the executive director of 21st century democrats, mark lotwis, called the lawsuit "frivolous" and said: "we\'re going to defend our organization\'s integrity". landmark education spokeswoman deborah beroset said that the landmark forum "is in no way religious in nature and any claim to the contrary is simply absurd," and stated: "while we are not a party to this lawsuit and have no firsthand knowledge of it, we can only assume that we are being used as a legal and political football to further the plaintiff"s own financial interests." the new york lawsuit was filed april 14, and is still in early filing stages. a conference with the federal court judge in the case has been scheduled for june 17.\n The question is: mark lotwis is a democrat.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'while the house has been extremely active in passing bills addressing the key priorities of entrepreneurs, most of the legislation has hit a brick wall over in the senate.\n The question is: the house quickly passes bills addressing the priorities of entrepreneurs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "in november, the results of the 2008 united states senate election in minnesota showed republican norm coleman with a 215 vote lead over the democratic challenger franken. the close margin ―less than 0.0075 percent ―triggered an automatic recount which resulted in franken leading by 225 votes, the total ratified by the minnesota canvasing board january 5. the coleman campaign filed a motion january 6 in court to block the certification of franken's victory and prevent franken from taking a seat in the united states senate. on march 31, a three-judge panel hearing the case ordered 400 additional ballots be counted.\n The question is: norm coleman is a member of the republican party.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]
Examples ['forty-five percent of the bills examined were bipartisan, and 85 percent of the reviewed bills had republican lead sponsors. 8221; small business owners are disappointed by the republican track record, particularly the lack of productivity in the senate.\n The question is: the senate is the least productive.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'in a statement in the washington times, the executive director of 21st century democrats, mark lotwis, called the lawsuit "frivolous" and said: "we\'re going to defend our organization\'s integrity". landmark education spokeswoman deborah beroset said that the landmark forum "is in no way religious in nature and any claim to the contrary is simply absurd," and stated: "while we are not a party to this lawsuit and have no firsthand knowledge of it, we can only assume that we are being used as a legal and political football to further the plaintiff"s own financial interests." the new york lawsuit was filed april 14, and is still in early filing stages. a conference with the federal court judge in the case has been scheduled for june 17.\n The question is: mark lotwis is a democrat.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'while the house has been extremely active in passing bills addressing the key priorities of entrepreneurs, most of the legislation has hit a brick wall over in the senate.\n The question is: the house quickly passes bills addressing the priorities of entrepreneurs.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "in november, the results of the 2008 united states senate election in minnesota showed republican norm coleman with a 215 vote lead over the democratic challenger franken. the close margin ―less than 0.0075 percent ―triggered an automatic recount which resulted in franken leading by 225 votes, the total ratified by the minnesota canvasing board january 5. the coleman campaign filed a motion january 6 in court to block the certification of franken's victory and prevent franken from taking a seat in the united states senate. on march 31, a three-judge panel hearing the case ordered 400 additional ballots be counted.\n The question is: norm coleman is a member of the republican party.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]

the republican track record, particularly the lack of productivity in the senate.', 'hypothesis': 'the senate is the least productive.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'in a statement in the washington times, the executive director of 21st century democrats, mark lotwis, called the lawsuit "frivolous" and said: "we\'re going to defend our organization\'s integrity". landmark education spokeswoman firsthand knowledge of it, we can only assume that we are being used as a legal and political football to further the plaintiff"s own financial interests." the new york lawsuit was filed april 14, and is still in early filing stages. a conference with the federal court judge in the case has been scheduled for june 17.', 'hypothesis': 'mark lotwis is a democrat.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': quickly passes bills addressing the priorities of entrepreneurs.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "in november, the results of the 2008 united states senate election in minnesota showed republican norm total ratified by the minnesota canvasing board january 5. the coleman campaign filed a motion january 6 in court to block the certification of franken's victory and prevent franken from taking a seat
