the convention on international trade in endangered species - banned the trade in ivory.', 'hypothesis': 'the african elephant population was decimated by poachers.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a report by the africanelephant specialist group, which is responsible for monitoring the conservation of the elephants,concludes that elephant poaching has increased despite the 1989 international ban on ivory trading', 'hypothesis': 'the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'banning ivory is the surest road to extinction for the african elephant, argue leaders in those countries.', 'hypothesis': 'the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'thanks to a global ban on the ivory trade that was passed in 1989 by the convention on international trade in endangered species of wild fauna and flora (cites), the african elephant population may be reversing its spiral toward extinction', 'hypothesis': 'the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['the west has preferred to focus on endangered animals, rather than endangered humans. african elephants are hunted down and stripped of tusks and hidden by poachers. their numbers in africa slumped from 1.2m to 600,000 in a decade until cites - the convention on international trade in endangered species - banned the trade in ivory.\n The question is: the african elephant population was decimated by poachers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a report by the africanelephant specialist group, which is responsible for monitoring the conservation of the elephants,concludes that elephant poaching has increased despite the 1989 international ban on ivory trading\n The question is: the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'banning ivory is the surest road to extinction for the african elephant, argue leaders in those countries.\n The question is: the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'thanks to a global ban on the ivory trade that was passed in 1989 by the convention on international trade in endangered species of wild fauna and flora (cites), the african elephant population may be reversing its spiral toward extinction\n The question is: the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
Examples ['the west has preferred to focus on endangered animals, rather than endangered humans. african elephants are hunted down and stripped of tusks and hidden by poachers. their numbers in africa slumped from 1.2m to 600,000 in a decade until cites - the convention on international trade in endangered species - banned the trade in ivory.\n The question is: the african elephant population was decimated by poachers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a report by the africanelephant specialist group, which is responsible for monitoring the conservation of the elephants,concludes that elephant poaching has increased despite the 1989 international ban on ivory trading\n The question is: the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'banning ivory is the surest road to extinction for the african elephant, argue leaders in those countries.\n The question is: the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['the west has preferred to focus on endangered animals, rather than endangered humans. african elephants are hunted down and stripped of tusks and hidden by poachers. their numbers in africa slumped from 1.2m to 600,000 in a decade until cites - the convention on international trade in endangered species - banned the trade in ivory.\n The question is: the african elephant population was decimated by poachers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a report by the africanelephant specialist group, which is responsible for monitoring the conservation of the elephants,concludes that elephant poaching has increased despite the 1989 international ban on ivory trading\n The question is: the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'banning ivory is the surest road to extinction for the african elephant, argue leaders in those countries.\n The question is: the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'thanks to a global ban on the ivory trade that was passed in 1989 by the convention on international trade in endangered species of wild fauna and flora (cites), the african elephant population may be reversing its spiral toward extinction\n The question is: the ban on ivory trade has been effective in protecting the elephant from extinction.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'in greek mythology mount olympus was the home of the gods and the site of the throne of zeus, the chief deity.', 'hypothesis': 'mount olympus is in greece.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'mount olympus, the highest mountain in the olympic range, rises to a height of 7,965 feet (2,428 meters) and is less than 25 miles (40 kilometers) from the strait of juan de fuca.', 'hypothesis': 'mount olympus is in the olympic range.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'mount olympus, the highest mountain in the olympic range, rises to a height of 7,965 feet (2,428 meters) and is less than 25 miles (40 kilometers) from the strait of juan de fuca.', 'hypothesis': 'mount olympus is near the strait of juan de fuca.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the pharos, a monumental lighthouse built around 280 bc and standing 330 ft high, lit the entrance to alexandria harbour for centuries, but archeologists have never been able to identify positively any remains.', 'hypothesis': 'the pharos lighthouse was located in alexandria.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['in greek mythology mount olympus was the home of the gods and the site of the throne of zeus, the chief deity.\n The question is: mount olympus is in greece.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'mount olympus, the highest mountain in the olympic range, rises to a height of 7,965 feet (2,428 meters) and is less than 25 miles (40 kilometers) from the strait of juan de fuca.\n The question is: mount olympus is in the olympic range.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'mount olympus, the highest mountain in the olympic range, rises to a height of 7,965 feet (2,428 meters) and is less than 25 miles (40 kilometers) from the strait of juan de fuca.\n The question is: mount olympus is near the strait of juan de fuca.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the pharos, a monumental lighthouse built around 280 bc and standing 330 ft high, lit the entrance to alexandria harbour for centuries, but archeologists have never been able to identify positively any remains.\n The question is: the pharos lighthouse was located in alexandria.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.', 'hypothesis': 'yunus wants to start a company.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.", 'hypothesis': 'mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.\n The question is: yunus wants to start a company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.\n The question is: mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.', 'hypothesis': 'yunus wants to start a company.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.", 'hypothesis': 'mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'true'}], [{'premise': 'as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.', 'hypothesis': 'yunus wants to start a company.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.", 'hypothesis': 'mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. Examples ['as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.\n The question is: yunus wants to start a company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.\n The question is: mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
Examples ['as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.\n The question is: yunus wants to start a company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.\n The question is: mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.', 'hypothesis': 'yunus wants to start a company.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.", 'hypothesis': 'mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'true'}], [{'premise': 'as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.', 'hypothesis': 'yunus wants to start a company.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.", 'hypothesis': 'mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.\n The question is: yunus wants to start a company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.\n The question is: mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
Examples ['as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.\n The question is: yunus wants to start a company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.\n The question is: mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.', 'hypothesis': 'yunus wants to start a company.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.", 'hypothesis': 'mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."', 'hypothesis': 'an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['as his jubilant nation cheered, yunus told reporters in the capital of dhaka that he wants "to work to create some more new things in the world" and would use the award money to start a company to produce inexpensive yet nutritious food for poor people and set up an eye hospital to treat impoverished patients.\n The question is: yunus wants to start a company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "miles of australia's most pristine coastline have been declared a disaster zone following a large oil spill from a storm-damaged cargo ship. at least 60 kilometres of queensland's southeastern shore were contaminated when at least 42 tonnes of oil spilled into the ocean from mv pacific adventurer on wednesday night.  the ship, which had sailed into cyclonic weather, lost 31 containers aboard, one of which pierced the ship's hull and a fuel tank.  anna bligh, the queensland premier, has declared moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast disaster zones.\n The question is: mv pacific adventurer has lost oil in the area of moreton island, bribie island and southern parts of the sunshine coast.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['gunmen loyal to bosnian serb nationalist leader radovan karadzic conquered 70% of bosnia with their arsenal of tanks, aircraft and howitzers bequeathed by the yugoslav army.\n The question is: radovan karadzic is the leader of bosnia.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'in bosnia, diplomatic determination combined with military muscle to create an opportunity to secure a peace rather than permit instability to undermine this fragile region and u.s. interests.\n The question is: the dayton peace treaty was formulated to end the war in bosnia.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the dayton peace accords for bosnia and herzegovina was the first major peace agreement adopted after the beijing conference, in december 1995.\n The question is: the dayton peace treaty was formulated to end the war in bosnia.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the european-born groups with the highest labor force participation rates were  from bosnia and herzegovina\n The question is: the european country with the highest birth rate is bosnia-herzegovina.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': "toshiba, the world's third-largest notebook computer maker behind dell inc. and hewlett-packard co., said the pc would be introduced in japan in early 2006.", 'hypothesis': 'toshiba produces notebook computers.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'sweden has plans to open a virtual embassy in second life, the virtual world home to thousands of netizens. companies like dell are already selling computers via the virtual world, but sweden would become the first country to have a cyber-embassy in second life. the embassy would not provide visa or perform diplomatic tasks, but would provide information on how and where to get these documents in the real world, as well as giving cultural and tourist information about the country. visitors will also be able to chat with embassy personnel. a spokesperson explained that it would be an easy and cheap way to reach young people. the idea came from the swedish institute, an agency of the foreign affairs ministry of sweden with providing information about sweden as a key purpose. the "house of sweden" as it will be called, will be modelled on the new swedish embassy in washington with the same name. the opening is expected in a few weeks. second life has over 3 million registered accounts. on an average day, the maximum of people logged in at the same time peaks at 25,000. in september 2006, second life was reported to have a gross domestic product of $64 million. some schools in the united states and canada have virtual classrooms on the site. people like ailin graef a.k.a. anshe chung have developed virtual businesses in second life, and earn thousands of real dollars there.', 'hypothesis': 'dell is a swedish company.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "microsoft's (msft) own search engine will permanently replace the yahoo (yhoo) search technology that has been used on microsoft's msn website.", 'hypothesis': "yahoo's technology will still be used.", 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'in addition to data bases and publicity, stolen art is recovered when someone seeks appraisal or offers it for sale to dealers or auction houses, responds to a reward offer, attempts to remove it through customs, or requests a ransom for the art.', 'hypothesis': 'centralized inventory records for museums aid in theft awareness.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ["toshiba, the world's third-largest notebook computer maker behind dell inc. and hewlett-packard co., said the pc would be introduced in japan in early 2006.\n The question is: toshiba produces notebook computers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'sweden has plans to open a virtual embassy in second life, the virtual world home to thousands of netizens. companies like dell are already selling computers via the virtual world, but sweden would become the first country to have a cyber-embassy in second life. the embassy would not provide visa or perform diplomatic tasks, but would provide information on how and where to get these documents in the real world, as well as giving cultural and tourist information about the country. visitors will also be able to chat with embassy personnel. a spokesperson explained that it would be an easy and cheap way to reach young people. the idea came from the swedish institute, an agency of the foreign affairs ministry of sweden with providing information about sweden as a key purpose. the "house of sweden" as it will be called, will be modelled on the new swedish embassy in washington with the same name. the opening is expected in a few weeks. second life has over 3 million registered accounts. on an average day, the maximum of people logged in at the same time peaks at 25,000. in september 2006, second life was reported to have a gross domestic product of $64 million. some schools in the united states and canada have virtual classrooms on the site. people like ailin graef a.k.a. anshe chung have developed virtual businesses in second life, and earn thousands of real dollars there.\n The question is: dell is a swedish company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "microsoft's (msft) own search engine will permanently replace the yahoo (yhoo) search technology that has been used on microsoft's msn website.\n The question is: yahoo's technology will still be used.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'in addition to data bases and publicity, stolen art is recovered when someone seeks appraisal or offers it for sale to dealers or auction houses, responds to a reward offer, attempts to remove it through customs, or requests a ransom for the art.\n The question is: centralized inventory records for museums aid in theft awareness.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

{'premise': 'sweden has plans to open a virtual embassy in second life, the virtual world home to thousands of netizens. companies like dell are already selling computers via the virtual world, but Examples ["toshiba, the world's third-largest notebook computer maker behind dell inc. and hewlett-packard co., said the pc would be introduced in japan in early 2006.\n The question is: toshiba produces notebook computers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'sweden has plans to open a virtual embassy in second life, the virtual world home to thousands of netizens. companies like dell are already selling computers via the virtual world, but sweden would become the first country to have a cyber-embassy in second life. the embassy would not provide visa or perform diplomatic tasks, but would provide information on how and where to get these documents in the real world, as well as giving cultural and tourist information about the country. visitors will also be able to chat with embassy personnel. a spokesperson explained that it would be an easy and cheap way to reach young people. the idea came from the swedish institute, an agency of the foreign affairs ministry of sweden with providing information about sweden as a key purpose. the "house of sweden" as it will be called, will be modelled on the new swedish embassy in washington with the same name. the opening is expected in a few weeks. second life has over 3 million registered accounts. on an average day, the maximum of people logged in at the same time peaks at 25,000. in september 2006, second life was reported to have a gross domestic product of $64 million. some schools in the united states and canada have virtual classrooms on the site. people like ailin graef a.k.a. anshe chung have developed virtual businesses in second life, and earn thousands of real dollars there.\n The question is: dell is a swedish company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "microsoft's (msft) own search engine will permanently replace the yahoo (yhoo) search technology that has been used on microsoft's msn website.\n The question is: yahoo's technology will still be used.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'in addition to data bases and publicity, stolen art is recovered when someone seeks appraisal or offers it for sale to dealers or auction houses, responds to a reward offer, attempts to remove it through customs, or requests a ransom for the art.\n The question is: centralized inventory records for museums aid in theft awareness.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
Examples ["toshiba, the world's third-largest notebook computer maker behind dell inc. and hewlett-packard co., said the pc would be introduced in japan in early 2006.\n The question is: toshiba produces notebook computers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'sweden has plans to open a virtual embassy in second life, the virtual world home to thousands of netizens. companies like dell are already selling computers via the virtual world, but sweden would become the first country to have a cyber-embassy in second life. the embassy would not provide visa or perform diplomatic tasks, but would provide information on how and where to get these documents in the real world, as well as giving cultural and tourist information about the country. visitors will also be able to chat with embassy personnel. a spokesperson explained that it would be an easy and cheap way to reach young people. the idea came from the swedish institute, an agency of the foreign affairs ministry of sweden with providing information about sweden as a key purpose. the "house of sweden" as it will be called, will be modelled on the new swedish embassy in washington with the same name. the opening is expected in a few weeks. second life has over 3 million registered accounts. on an average day, the maximum of people logged in at the same time peaks at 25,000. in september 2006, second life was reported to have a gross domestic product of $64 million. some schools in the united states and canada have virtual classrooms on the site. people like ailin graef a.k.a. anshe chung have developed virtual businesses in second life, and earn thousands of real dollars there.\n The question is: dell is a swedish company.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "microsoft's (msft) own search engine will permanently replace the yahoo (yhoo) search technology that has been used on microsoft's msn website.\n The question is: yahoo's technology will still be used.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'in addition to data bases and publicity, stolen art is recovered when someone seeks appraisal or offers it for sale to dealers or auction houses, responds to a reward offer, attempts to remove it through customs, or requests a ransom for the art.\n The question is: centralized inventory records for museums aid in theft awareness.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ["toshiba, the world's third-largest notebook computer maker behind dell inc. and hewlett-packard co., said the pc would be introduced in japan in early 2006.\n The question is: toshiba produces notebook computers.. ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'zhang and his co-workers performed behavioral tests on two purified cannabinoids. the test results indicated that these two cannabinoids have anti-anxiety and antidepression-like effects in rats that may depend on the ability of cannabinoids to promote the production of new neurons in the hippocampus. marijuana contains a complex mixture of chemicals including cannabinoids and may have somewhat different behavioral effects than the purified cannabinoids tested so far.', 'hypothesis': 'the use of drugs can help control anxiety.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'seasonal affective disorder (sad), a type of depression, is a debilitating problem that interferes with the quality of life of thousands of patients, especially during the fall, winter and early spring. this syndrome seems to be a worldwide phenomenon and occurs cross culturally, especially in countries far from the equator.', 'hypothesis': 'seasonal affective disorder (sad) is a worldwide disorder.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'a recent study found no evidence of seasonal affective disorder in iceland where the sun does not appear for a long time in the winter.', 'hypothesis': 'seasonal affective disorder (sad) is a worldwide disorder.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'for others, in the northern hemisphere, judgment may be a little off due to seasonal affective disorder (sad), which is often at its peak in the weeks following the shortest hours of daylight.', 'hypothesis': 'seasonal affective disorder (sad) is a worldwide disorder.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['zhang and his co-workers performed behavioral tests on two purified cannabinoids. the test results indicated that these two cannabinoids have anti-anxiety and antidepression-like effects in rats that may depend on the ability of cannabinoids to promote the production of new neurons in the hippocampus. marijuana contains a complex mixture of chemicals including cannabinoids and may have somewhat different behavioral effects than the purified cannabinoids tested so far.\n The question is: the use of drugs can help control anxiety.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'seasonal affective disorder (sad), a type of depression, is a debilitating problem that interferes with the quality of life of thousands of patients, especially during the fall, winter and early spring. this syndrome seems to be a worldwide phenomenon and occurs cross culturally, especially in countries far from the equator.\n The question is: seasonal affective disorder (sad) is a worldwide disorder.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'a recent study found no evidence of seasonal affective disorder in iceland where the sun does not appear for a long time in the winter.\n The question is: seasonal affective disorder (sad) is a worldwide disorder.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'for others, in the northern hemisphere, judgment may be a little off due to seasonal affective disorder (sad), which is often at its peak in the weeks following the shortest hours of daylight.\n The question is: seasonal affective disorder (sad) is a worldwide disorder.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['italian director federico fellini was older than his american peers at his first nomination and, like other foreigners, had not been nominated for his earlier masterworks, "la strada" and "nights of cabiria", though both films had won the best foreign-language picture in 1956 and 1957, respectively. fellini later received an honorary oscar in 1993, which was basically a compensatory gesture.\n The question is: an italian director is awarded an honorary oscar.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'oscar-winning director franco zeffirelli has been awarded an honorary knighthood for his "valuable services to british performing arts".\n The question is: italian director is awarded an honorary oscar.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'hepburn, a four-time academy award winner, died last june in connecticut at age 96.\n The question is: hepburn, who won four oscars, died last june aged 96.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'contrast the leitrim story with that of rita levi-montalcini, an italian nobel laureate who turned 100 last wednesday. she still attends for work every day at the european brain research institute in rome, which she founded. she was appointed a senator for life in 2001, and in 2006, aged 97, she attended the opening assembly of the newly elected senate. she takes part in discussions in the upper house, and in 2004 defended the teaching of evolution in italian schools. there is no record of her having claimed a day off because of festival commitments. apparently she even manages to work right through the rose of tralee without lifting her head from her petri dish.\n The question is: rita levi-montalcini is a nobel prize winner.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': "standing off to one side, seeing all and hearing mozart's music, which only he understands to be a manifestation of god's love, is antonio salieri, the ambitious italian-born composer and conductor, a favorite at the imperial court in vienna in 1781.", 'hypothesis': 'wolfgang amadeus mozart was born in salzburg.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'meanwhile, at a pushkin-goethe festival held recently in moscow to observe the poets\' birthdays (this year is goethe\'s 250th), dmitri prigov, a post-modernist poet and conceptual artist, took the first line from "onegin" ("my uncle - high ideals inspire him") and set it to buddhist and muslim mantras and russian orthodox and gregorian chants.', 'hypothesis': 'johann wolfgang von goethe was born in germany.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "the altenburg is located in the jenaer street which lies just outside of weimar's city centre beyond the ilm park. it was built in 1810-1811 and during the years following 1848, princess carolyne of sayn wittgenstein and her husband, franz liszt, lived there.", 'hypothesis': 'franz liszt lived from 1811 to 1886.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'franz liszt, a hungarian composer who lived from 1811 to 1886 was the equivalent of a rock star in his day. his piano compositions were extremely popular and he often gave concerts to his multitude of fans. liszt was also the pioneer of many musical techniques, including the symphonic poem and the technique of transforming themes.', 'hypothesis': 'franz liszt lived from 1811 to 1886.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ["standing off to one side, seeing all and hearing mozart's music, which only he understands to be a manifestation of god's love, is antonio salieri, the ambitious italian-born composer and conductor, a favorite at the imperial court in vienna in 1781.\n The question is: wolfgang amadeus mozart was born in salzburg.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'meanwhile, at a pushkin-goethe festival held recently in moscow to observe the poets\' birthdays (this year is goethe\'s 250th), dmitri prigov, a post-modernist poet and conceptual artist, took the first line from "onegin" ("my uncle - high ideals inspire him") and set it to buddhist and muslim mantras and russian orthodox and gregorian chants.\n The question is: johann wolfgang von goethe was born in germany.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "the altenburg is located in the jenaer street which lies just outside of weimar's city centre beyond the ilm park. it was built in 1810-1811 and during the years following 1848, princess carolyne of sayn wittgenstein and her husband, franz liszt, lived there.\n The question is: franz liszt lived from 1811 to 1886.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'franz liszt, a hungarian composer who lived from 1811 to 1886 was the equivalent of a rock star in his day. his piano compositions were extremely popular and he often gave concerts to his multitude of fans. liszt was also the pioneer of many musical techniques, including the symphonic poem and the technique of transforming themes.\n The question is: franz liszt lived from 1811 to 1886.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'the german-based team say their study is the only report of prolonged hibernation in a tropical mammal.', 'hypothesis': 'the team studies hibernating mammals in germany.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'scientists have uncovered soft bone tissue of a tyrannosaurus rex known as mor 1125, found in a sandstone formation in montana. mor 1125 was 18 years old when it died, 65 million years ago. similar tissue of a dinosaur has never been found before, as all remains found until now were fosilized. the tissue still contains microscopic structures resembling bloodvessels and cells. the comparison between the structures found in the t-rex and a modern day ostrich shows a remarkable similarity. the results have been duplicated with an 80-million-year-old hadrosaur and two other tyrannosaurs. the discovery was reported in today\'s issue of science. results similar to the popular film "jurassic park" are unlikely, as the recovery of dna from the tissue is improbable. the results remain astounding, however, and tests with antibodies that react to collagen shows the tissue may still contain proteins. "ultimately if we could establish chemical composition, we would have insights into all kinds of things: diet, sexual maturity, whether the specimen is the male or female.", paleontologist hans-dieter sues said.', 'hypothesis': 'paleontologist hans-dieter sues and other scientists discovered a t rex bone in montana.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': "archaeologists have found approximately 30 beautifully preserved mummies in a 4,000 year old egyptian necropolis which held 53 tombs. supervisor of antiquities for middle egypt dr. abdel-rahman el-ayedi's team established his archaeological site in the faiyum oasis near the el-lahun egyptian pyramid which is just south of cairo. besides the mummies, the team found masks, amulets, clay pots and an offering table located in a funerary chapel. the chapel dates back to about 30 bc to 337 ad.", 'hypothesis': '30 beautifully preserved mummies have been located in the south of cairo.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the hullabaloo is over a glacial period dating to about 750 million to 600 million years ago.', 'hypothesis': 'a glacial period occurred about 750 million to 600 million years ago.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['the german-based team say their study is the only report of prolonged hibernation in a tropical mammal.\n The question is: the team studies hibernating mammals in germany.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'scientists have uncovered soft bone tissue of a tyrannosaurus rex known as mor 1125, found in a sandstone formation in montana. mor 1125 was 18 years old when it died, 65 million years ago. similar tissue of a dinosaur has never been found before, as all remains found until now were fosilized. the tissue still contains microscopic structures resembling bloodvessels and cells. the comparison between the structures found in the t-rex and a modern day ostrich shows a remarkable similarity. the results have been duplicated with an 80-million-year-old hadrosaur and two other tyrannosaurs. the discovery was reported in today\'s issue of science. results similar to the popular film "jurassic park" are unlikely, as the recovery of dna from the tissue is improbable. the results remain astounding, however, and tests with antibodies that react to collagen shows the tissue may still contain proteins. "ultimately if we could establish chemical composition, we would have insights into all kinds of things: diet, sexual maturity, whether the specimen is the male or female.", paleontologist hans-dieter sues said.\n The question is: paleontologist hans-dieter sues and other scientists discovered a t rex bone in montana.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "archaeologists have found approximately 30 beautifully preserved mummies in a 4,000 year old egyptian necropolis which held 53 tombs. supervisor of antiquities for middle egypt dr. abdel-rahman el-ayedi's team established his archaeological site in the faiyum oasis near the el-lahun egyptian pyramid which is just south of cairo. besides the mummies, the team found masks, amulets, clay pots and an offering table located in a funerary chapel. the chapel dates back to about 30 bc to 337 ad.\n The question is: 30 beautifully preserved mummies have been located in the south of cairo.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true", 'the hullabaloo is over a glacial period dating to about 750 million to 600 million years ago.\n The question is: a glacial period occurred about 750 million to 600 million years ago.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "it seems that due to the weather conditions the chance is little, but we still hope," djamal stated. with 17 crew members, and carrying 200 tons of cargo, the ill-fated pt nur budi owned and operated ferry sank so fast that the crew "had no chance to ask the passengers to wear life jackets."\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the ferry owner pt nur budi\'s spokesman blamed indonesian port authorities for the tragedy. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'a mercenary group, faithful to the warmongering policy of former somozist colonel enrique bermudez, attacked an ifa truck belonging to the interior ministry at 0900 on 26 march in el jicote, wounded and killed an interior ministry worker and wounded five others.\n The question is: a mercenary group was injured in el jicote.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true"]

Examples ['according to the captain, the 1999 ferry was inspected by the transport ministry on december 9 and was certified to be in good condition. "the passenger capacity of the ferry is 205 people but the port administrator accepted more passengers as they thought it was possible," he said. the national meteorological and geophysics agency, however, had published and raised an alert signal about high waves on friday. it specifically stated that "saturday 10th and sunday 11th, indonesian waters would have witnessed storm force waves," but despite the dire warnings km teratai set for the seas.\n The question is: an indonesian ferry with 300 passengers sank.. ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'the norwegian newspaper corpus is a large and self-expanding corpus of norwegian newspaper texts. the collection of this dynamic and continually growing corpus began in 1998.', 'hypothesis': 'dagbladet is a norwegian newspaper.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'the norwegian newspaper dagbladet printed an article about the "intolerance page".', 'hypothesis': 'dagbladet is a norwegian newspaper.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'the publishing of a series of cartoons of the prophet mohammad in a copenhagen newspaper sparked a string of harsh and in some places violent reactions in the middle east, forcing european leaders to try to calm the situation. this backlash started in late september 2005, when the danish newspaper jyllands-posten published a dozen cartoons depicting the prophet mohammad. the images ranged from serious to comical in nature; a particularly controversial cartoon portrays mohammad with a bomb wrapped in his turban. the jutland-based newspaper states that the images were meant to inspire some level of public debate over the image of islam in europe, and had no direct aim of offending anyone.', 'hypothesis': 'jyllands-posten is published in copenhagen.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'euro-scandinavian media cheer denmark v sweden draw.', 'hypothesis': 'denmark and sweden tie.', 'label': 'true'}]]
Examples ['the norwegian newspaper corpus is a large and self-expanding corpus of norwegian newspaper texts. the collection of this dynamic and continually growing corpus began in 1998.\n The question is: dagbladet is a norwegian newspaper.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'the norwegian newspaper dagbladet printed an article about the "intolerance page".\n The question is: dagbladet is a norwegian newspaper.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the publishing of a series of cartoons of the prophet mohammad in a copenhagen newspaper sparked a string of harsh and in some places violent reactions in the middle east, forcing european leaders to try to calm the situation. this backlash started in late september 2005, when the danish newspaper jyllands-posten published a dozen cartoons depicting the prophet mohammad. the images ranged from serious to comical in nature; a particularly controversial cartoon portrays mohammad with a bomb wrapped in his turban. the jutland-based newspaper states that the images were meant to inspire some level of public debate over the image of islam in europe, and had no direct aim of offending anyone.\n The question is: jyllands-posten is published in copenhagen.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'euro-scandinavian media cheer denmark v sweden draw.\n The question is: denmark and sweden tie.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the norwegian newspaper dagbladet printed an article about the "intolerance page".\n The question is: dagbladet is a norwegian newspaper.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'the publishing of a series of cartoons of the prophet mohammad in a copenhagen newspaper sparked a string of harsh and in some places violent reactions in the middle east, forcing european leaders to try to calm the situation. this backlash started in late september 2005, when the danish newspaper jyllands-posten published a dozen cartoons depicting the prophet mohammad. the images ranged from serious to comical in nature; a particularly controversial cartoon portrays mohammad with a bomb wrapped in his turban. the jutland-based newspaper states that the images were meant to inspire some level of public debate over the image of islam in europe, and had no direct aim of offending anyone.\n The question is: jyllands-posten is published in copenhagen.. Examples ['nine soldiers and two police officers were killed in the ensuing gun battle, and two police officers were wounded, the officials said.\n The question is: six policemen and two soldiers were killed in a gunbattle, officials said.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', "according to an israeli official, the murders of galan, a high-ranking police officer, and a judge last week were probably carried out by an israeli mercenary paid by the medellin cartel - the world's most powerful drug-trafficking mafia - which has set up paramilitary squads accused of hundreds of individual murders and massacres against political and labor leaders, as well as peasants and patriotic union leftist militants in different parts of the country.\n The question is: an israeli official was killed by patriotic union leftist militants.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false", 'a rocket attack killed two israelis, including a 3-year-old boy.\n The question is: a three-year-old was killed in a rocket attack.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'police sources stated that during the bomb attack involving the shining path, two people were injured.\n The question is: two people were wounded by a bomb.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'president vladimir putin vowed monday to track down the killers of anna politkovskaya, while her colleagues at novaya gazeta pledged to continue her work despite dangers.', 'hypothesis': 'anna politkovskaya was murdered.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'anna politkovskaya was found shot dead on saturday in a lift at her block of flats in the russian capital, moscow.', 'hypothesis': 'anna politkovskaya was murdered.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.', 'hypothesis': 'a civilian was killed by a car bomb.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'ordonez reyes accused jose jesus pena, alleged chief of security for the nicaraguan embassy in tegucigalpa, of masterminding the january 7th assassination of contra-commander manuel antonio rugama.', 'hypothesis': 'manuel antonio rugama was killed by jose jesus pena.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['president vladimir putin vowed monday to track down the killers of anna politkovskaya, while her colleagues at novaya gazeta pledged to continue her work despite dangers.\n The question is: anna politkovskaya was murdered.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'anna politkovskaya was found shot dead on saturday in a lift at her block of flats in the russian capital, moscow.\n The question is: anna politkovskaya was murdered.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'referring to the april 2 car bomb explosion perpetrated in santa tecla, the fmln-fdr claimed responsibility for the attack in a communique, and said that it was "an action aimed directly at the police" and that "they regret the death of a civilian," but they did not mention compensation for the relatives.\n The question is: a civilian was killed by a car bomb.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'ordonez reyes accused jose jesus pena, alleged chief of security for the nicaraguan embassy in tegucigalpa, of masterminding the january 7th assassination of contra-commander manuel antonio rugama.\n The question is: manuel antonio rugama was killed by jose jesus pena.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']
ICL Examples [[{'premise': 'jerusalem, april 2 (xinhua) -- israel\'s new foreign minister avigdor lieberman was questioned by police on thursday over several criminal allegations, local news service ynet reported.  national fraud unit investigators questioned the deputy premier, who is suspected of bribery, money laundering, fraud and breach of trust, for over seven hours, and another round is in the cards, said the report.  "lieberman answered all of the questions he was asked, and will continue to do so in the future," his attorney yaron kostelitz was quoted as saying.', 'hypothesis': 'avigdor lieberman is the foreign minister of israel.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'following the israel-egypt peace treaty of 1979, israel agreed to withdraw from the sinai peninsula, in exchange for peace with its neighbor. for over two decades, the sinai peninsula was home to about 7,000 israelis.', 'hypothesis': 'the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.', 'label': 'true'}, {'premise': 'canada and the united states signed an agreement on january 30, 1979, to amend the treaty to allow subsistence hunting of waterfowl.', 'hypothesis': 'the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.', 'label': 'false'}, {'premise': 'although most palestinians crossed into egypt in order to shop and see relatives, palestinian officials say that the recent border chaos enabled smugglers to bring drugs and weapons into gaza.', 'hypothesis': 'egyptian and palestinian border guards failed repeatedly in efforts to end the chaos and to close the border.', 'label': 'false'}]]
Examples ['jerusalem, april 2 (xinhua) -- israel\'s new foreign minister avigdor lieberman was questioned by police on thursday over several criminal allegations, local news service ynet reported.  national fraud unit investigators questioned the deputy premier, who is suspected of bribery, money laundering, fraud and breach of trust, for over seven hours, and another round is in the cards, said the report.  "lieberman answered all of the questions he was asked, and will continue to do so in the future," his attorney yaron kostelitz was quoted as saying.\n The question is: avigdor lieberman is the foreign minister of israel.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'following the israel-egypt peace treaty of 1979, israel agreed to withdraw from the sinai peninsula, in exchange for peace with its neighbor. for over two decades, the sinai peninsula was home to about 7,000 israelis.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'canada and the united states signed an agreement on january 30, 1979, to amend the treaty to allow subsistence hunting of waterfowl.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'although most palestinians crossed into egypt in order to shop and see relatives, palestinian officials say that the recent border chaos enabled smugglers to bring drugs and weapons into gaza.\n The question is: egyptian and palestinian border guards failed repeatedly in efforts to end the chaos and to close the border.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['jerusalem, april 2 (xinhua) -- israel\'s new foreign minister avigdor lieberman was questioned by police on thursday over several criminal allegations, local news service ynet reported.  national fraud unit investigators questioned the deputy premier, who is suspected of bribery, money laundering, fraud and breach of trust, for over seven hours, and another round is in the cards, said the report.  "lieberman answered all of the questions he was asked, and will continue to do so in the future," his attorney yaron kostelitz was quoted as saying.\n The question is: avigdor lieberman is the foreign minister of israel.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'following the israel-egypt peace treaty of 1979, israel agreed to withdraw from the sinai peninsula, in exchange for peace with its neighbor. for over two decades, the sinai peninsula was home to about 7,000 israelis.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'canada and the united states signed an agreement on january 30, 1979, to amend the treaty to allow subsistence hunting of waterfowl.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'although most palestinians crossed into egypt in order to shop and see relatives, palestinian officials say that the recent border chaos enabled smugglers to bring drugs and weapons into gaza.\n The question is: egyptian and palestinian border guards failed repeatedly in efforts to end the chaos and to close the border.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
Examples ['jerusalem, april 2 (xinhua) -- israel\'s new foreign minister avigdor lieberman was questioned by police on thursday over several criminal allegations, local news service ynet reported.  national fraud unit investigators questioned the deputy premier, who is suspected of bribery, money laundering, fraud and breach of trust, for over seven hours, and another round is in the cards, said the report.  "lieberman answered all of the questions he was asked, and will continue to do so in the future," his attorney yaron kostelitz was quoted as saying.\n The question is: avigdor lieberman is the foreign minister of israel.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'following the israel-egypt peace treaty of 1979, israel agreed to withdraw from the sinai peninsula, in exchange for peace with its neighbor. for over two decades, the sinai peninsula was home to about 7,000 israelis.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'canada and the united states signed an agreement on january 30, 1979, to amend the treaty to allow subsistence hunting of waterfowl.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'although most palestinians crossed into egypt in order to shop and see relatives, palestinian officials say that the recent border chaos enabled smugglers to bring drugs and weapons into gaza.\n The question is: egyptian and palestinian border guards failed repeatedly in efforts to end the chaos and to close the border.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['jerusalem, april 2 (xinhua) -- israel\'s new foreign minister avigdor lieberman was questioned by police on thursday over several criminal allegations, local news service ynet reported.  national fraud unit investigators questioned the deputy premier, who is suspected of bribery, money laundering, fraud and breach of trust, for over seven hours, and another round is in the cards, said the report.  "lieberman answered all of the questions he was asked, and will continue to do so in the future," his attorney yaron kostelitz was quoted as saying.\n The question is: avigdor lieberman is the foreign minister of israel.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'following the israel-egypt peace treaty of 1979, israel agreed to withdraw from the sinai peninsula, in exchange for peace with its neighbor. for over two decades, the sinai peninsula was home to about 7,000 israelis.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'canada and the united states signed an agreement on january 30, 1979, to amend the treaty to allow subsistence hunting of waterfowl.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'although most palestinians crossed into egypt in order to shop and see relatives, palestinian officials say that the recent border chaos enabled smugglers to bring drugs and weapons into gaza.\n The question is: egyptian and palestinian border guards failed repeatedly in efforts to end the chaos and to close the border.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']
Examples ['jerusalem, april 2 (xinhua) -- israel\'s new foreign minister avigdor lieberman was questioned by police on thursday over several criminal allegations, local news service ynet reported.  national fraud unit investigators questioned the deputy premier, who is suspected of bribery, money laundering, fraud and breach of trust, for over seven hours, and another round is in the cards, said the report.  "lieberman answered all of the questions he was asked, and will continue to do so in the future," his attorney yaron kostelitz was quoted as saying.\n The question is: avigdor lieberman is the foreign minister of israel.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'following the israel-egypt peace treaty of 1979, israel agreed to withdraw from the sinai peninsula, in exchange for peace with its neighbor. for over two decades, the sinai peninsula was home to about 7,000 israelis.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'canada and the united states signed an agreement on january 30, 1979, to amend the treaty to allow subsistence hunting of waterfowl.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true', 'although most palestinians crossed into egypt in order to shop and see relatives, palestinian officials say that the recent border chaos enabled smugglers to bring drugs and weapons into gaza.\n The question is: egyptian and palestinian border guards failed repeatedly in efforts to end the chaos and to close the border.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false']

Examples ['jerusalem, april 2 (xinhua) -- israel\'s new foreign minister avigdor lieberman was questioned by police on thursday over several criminal allegations, local news service ynet reported.  national fraud unit investigators questioned the deputy premier, who is suspected of bribery, money laundering, fraud and breach of trust, for over seven hours, and another round is in the cards, said the report.  "lieberman answered all of the questions he was asked, and will continue to do so in the future," his attorney yaron kostelitz was quoted as saying.\n The question is: avigdor lieberman is the foreign minister of israel.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'following the israel-egypt peace treaty of 1979, israel agreed to withdraw from the sinai peninsula, in exchange for peace with its neighbor. for over two decades, the sinai peninsula was home to about 7,000 israelis.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'canada and the united states signed an agreement on january 30, 1979, to amend the treaty to allow subsistence hunting of waterfowl.\n The question is: the israel-egypt peace agreement was signed in 1979.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ['the daily mail has confirmed it has pulled out of the bidding for rival newspaper the daily telegraph.\n The question is: daily telegraph is sold.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: false', 'sunday express, a tabloid newspaper from the uk reported an anonymous source claiming to be an insider to merger talks between wells fargo bank and barclays bank. the rumoured merger would be a radical break in the kinds of mergers wells fargo has done and has said it will continue to do (it is assumed that wells with the higher market capitalization would be the buyer). wells fargo has previously shown no desire to engage in retail banking outside the united states, and has only expanded internationally in its consumer finance business and with certain business services.\n The question is: barclays bank is one of the uk tabloid newspapers.. True or False?\nThe Answer is: true']

Examples ["india and pakistan have agreed to release hundreds of fishermen and other civilians in each other's jails, a goodwill measure that comes as part of a peace process between the two countries.\n The question is: india and pakistan have decided to free hundreds of civilian prisoners in each others jails..
